title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
content:
It took a couple of days for it to come, but I love it so much. It’s 150 mL, which is 50 mL more than the Snail Mucin Essence and the AHA Power Liquid and I’m guessing it’s about 4-5 inches tall? In my opinion, the spray nozzle is really convenient so you don’t need to use a cotton pad every time you use a toner (it’s optional). When I used it for the first time, it did irritate my skin a tiny bit BUT EVERYONE’S SKIN IS DIFFERENT, so it may have a different effect on other people. Try it for yourself! What I like about it is that every time when you spray it, a generous amount of product comes out so 3-4 sprays is okay. After spraying, I pat it in. Most sources say you can use daily, but I’m starting 3 days a week and building up to daily use to see how my skin reacts.
I’m pretty sure that this toner will be great for people who are trying to exfoliate to remove dead skin cells; however since it has such a low concentration it will take longer to see results. Thank you for the purchase! I hope this review helped!

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
content:
Tried this AHA/BHA clarifying toner for the first time and started off using it once a day. I don't have oily skin but did not feel like my skin was drying out from it. Due to my skin type, I did start to get a patch of redness & irritation from using it daily because of the acid ingredients, which has happened with other AHA/BHA products. So, I knew this product was working. I just cut back to using it 2 times a week to help with exfoliation. I like the fine mist spray, but I usually spray 2 pumps on my hand and pat onto my face. Then, I layer a different hydrating toner over this one. I prefer applying with my hands instead of a cotton pad/ball b/c I get more of the toner on my face and don't waste the toner trying to soak the cotton ball.

I like how this brand has a medical approach to skincare and that the products tend to be fragrance-free & dye-free, which can irritate skin.

The product is good for your texture, but runs out so fast..

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
content:
i’ve always struggled with bad acne and when i got on BC, my acne worsened, especially my hormonal cystic acne. Not to mention i have fairly sensitive skin. I’ve tried countless face washes, toners, moisturizers, spot creams and NOTHING was working. i even changed my curology prescription. i’ve used the pimple patches from this brand and absolutely love them. When i had ordered them they came with a sample spot treatment. i gave it a try and it was one of the first spot treatments EVER that seemed to work almost overnight. that’s what led me to trying this toner.

It’s lightweight (kinda just feels like water) and comes in a spray bottle which is amazing for easy application. i do a few sprays on my face and lightly rub it in w my fingertips to make sure my face is evenly coated and then let it air dry. and let me tell you this is by far my FAV toner i’ve ever used and i’ve only used it for abt a month or two. There’s no excessive stinging or drying out my skin and it helped with redness and inflammation just after 1 use. My cystic acne has started to clear up AMAZINGLY. i mostly only have slight hyperpigmentation (which it’s also helped with) from where pimples used to be but no current massive, active pimples on my face. if you’re thinking of trying this i would 100% recommend giving it a go. i just started using a few other products from this brand as well and so far so good :)

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2022
content: I’ve been using this product for 2 years and it has been the best toner I’ve ever used. I have sensitive acne prone skin and my pores were large at one point. And this toner has helped me with my acne and with my pores. The smell is amazing and it’s so refreshing.

title: [Cosrx] Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser 150milliliter / Foam Cleanser for Blemish Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
content: I've struggled with blemish-prone skin for years, and I've tried numerous cleansers to keep breakouts at bay. I decided to give this one a try, and I'm thrilled with the results. The key ingredient, salicylic acid, is a game-changer for me. It effectively unclogs pores and helps prevent breakouts without over-drying my skin. After just a week of using this cleanser, I noticed a significant improvement in the clarity of my skin. Blemishes are reduced, and my complexion looks brighter. Overall, this Cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine. It's effective, gentle, and affordable. If you have blemish-prone skin, I highly recommend giving it a try. You won't be disappointed!

title: [Cosrx] Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser 150milliliter / Foam Cleanser for Blemish Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
content: I used this cleanser for about 3 years. Used to love it. I've gone through some hormonal changes and my skin has become more acne prone. I had to go through the ingredient lists of my products with a fine-tooth comb, and this product contains lauric acid which is actually highly comedogenic- same rating as coconut oil. I switched to the CeraVe salicylic acid cleanser without that ingredient for about one month, and noticed far less texture on my skin. I think this product has some great ingredients and could work for some skin types, but the lauric acid may aggravate breakouts if you are prone to that. Cosrx is still my ride or die for moisturizer.

title: [Cosrx] Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser 150milliliter / Foam Cleanser for Blemish Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2021
content:
I tried this because I really liked the COSRX snail line and I needed a better cleanser. I was nervous because I've never had a good reaction to salicylic acid stuff before.
This is AMAZING. Absolutely gentle enough to use every day. For the first week or so my skin was a little drier and tighter, but now it's perfect. My acne is down and I didn't have my normal period pimples.
Also the bottle is made to dispense the perfect amount. A pea size is perfect and that's what the bottle puts out. No over dispensing product. And only needing such a small amount means this will last a while.
The salicylic acid is perfectly formulated to help control acne and not be over drying and it will be my daily cleanser for as long as they make it!

title: [Cosrx] Salicylic Acid Daily Gentle Cleanser 150milliliter / Foam Cleanser for Blemish Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2021
content:
Google the comedogenic ratings for these ingredients: Myristic Acid, Stearic Acid, Lauric Acid.

Off the charts! If you are acne-prone, ABORT ABORT. If you aren't acne-prone whatsoever and like salicylic acid, crack on. If you have ever gotten a pimple or acne cyst, run away from this product. You might think it feels nice and is moisturizing, but it's actually harsh and contains some of the biggest pore cloggers there are.

Lots of folks looking for an acne wash would seek out salicylic acid cleansers, but this is not the one for you.

date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2024
content: Historically Ive used the snail mucin power essence from this brand and this product is very similar, but a bit more hydrating. I don't like the 'milky' products this brand offers as I find they're too heavy and leave my skin tacky, dull and bumpy. The snail mucin alone wasn't quite hydrating enough. This product is a good in-between or add-in to whatever moisturizer you're using. I have acne prone oily/combination skin and this product sits well with me.

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Toner, 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml, For Dry Skin, Lightweight Daily Essence, Day and Night, Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2024
content:
To preface: I live in the high desert where the humidity is normally very low daily, and it also happens to be very windy. A deadly combo for skincare addicts.

My routine for the AM before integrating this COSRX serum was Cerave Salicylic Acid Facial Cleanser > Cerave PM > La Roche Posay Anthelios SPF 50 Mineral Sunscreen/Cerave AM, and my routine afterwards is now Cerave Salicylic Acid Facial Cleanser > COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Serum > Cerave PM > La Roche Posay Anthelios SPF 50 Mineral Sunscreen/Cerave AM.

This product has made a significant difference in my skincare regimen as an individual with combo skin that is also both sensitive and eczema prone. Before trying this product, I always noticed that by the time I would sign off of work at 5pm, my skin would normally feel tight and dry with my current routine and I could feel every blink or facial movement on the surface of my skin. After incorporating this serum, I’ve noticed that I don’t get that dry, tightened, sensitive feeling at the end of the day. It does leave a slightly tacky feeling once dry, but to me it is not distracting.

If you are an individual that wears SUNSCREEN regularly: from what I’ve noticed, it doesn’t work particularly well with sunscreens that are mineral based and have at least 20% of zinc and/or titanium oxide. Your skin may likely still feel a little dry at the end of the day. However with chemical sunscreen, this hasn’t been an issue for me.

Overall, I’ll be purchasing this again.

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Toner, 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml, For Dry Skin, Lightweight Daily Essence, Day and Night, Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
content:
I don't quite think this classifies as a toner, considering the label says "essence", but the semantics don't really matter to me.

This does its job fantastically-- it hydrates without being too much. Personally I have combination but leaning more dry, sensitive, acne prone skin (the whole shebang) and so far I absolutely love this essence for giving me extra hydration in my skincare routine. I checked the ingredients beforehand in a pore-clogging ingredient checker and it came back clear; after using I'm noticing no issues with breakouts.

It's a good essence. There's no scent and no weird residue left on the skin. If you're oily you might not need this but if you're dry it certainly won't hurt to use this in your routine for some extra hydration, especially in drier climates or during the winter.

The only drawback is that if you use this with a lot of other products in a lengthy skincare routine, these individual costs add up pretty quick, but there's actually quite a bit of product in this that should last you months even with twice daily use. I use the snail mucin essence from the same brand and I still haven't run out of it from twice daily use for four months-- I'm not even halfway through that one, even.

content:
this isn’t actually a 4% BHA like we would think as there is no salicylic acid in it.
It has betaine salicylates which isn’t the same.
The only research about betaine salicylate comes from Arch Personal Care Products, an ingredient manufacturer that sells this ingredient. According to their information based on in vivo testing, betaine salicylate shows comparable effectiveness to salicylic acid at double the concentration. in order to get the same results from betaine salicylate as a product with 2% salicylic acid, a 4% concentration of betaine salicylate is required.

title: COSRX Niacinamide 2% + BHA 4% Blackhead Exfoliant Toner 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml, Korean Toner, Blackhead Remover, Pore Minimizer for Enlarged Pores, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2024
content:
Late 30s male and I never learned proper skin care until a few years ago, and I'm still lazy about it. On some good advice, I stopped using apricot scrub and other physical exfoliators and tried this out. I still remember the first time I used it, being amazed at how effective it was compared to the nose-strips I had been using the week prior. I didn't even realize my pores were all enlarged until they shrank after using this a couple times a week. Three years later, I haven't really needed to try other chemical exfoliants because this was so effective; my blackheads are maybe 1/10th of what they used to be.

I'm single and dating, and I've often been told I have "perfect" skin, something I've never really received before.

For context: I use this after washing my face in the shower with a light cleanser, applying this immediately thereafter and following up with a moisturizer a few minutes after it dries. I do this 1-2 times a week as a preventative. Otherwise, I use a moisturizer daily (often with low SPF) and a witch hazel toner that I use to "freshen" myself on oily days or before re-applying SPF. I avoid fragrances, generally, outside of beard oil/wax. And that's it.

content:
My entire skincare line is COSRX. I absolutely adore the brand and it's given me the best skin. At 35 I get a lot of compliments on how clear and young my skin looks!

Sadly, I found this to be the first COSRX product that did not work for me. The actives in it are POWERFUL. I tried using it all all various frequencies. I edured a terrible month where my skin peeled, broke out, and itched terribly because I thought that it was purging and would eventually settle down. It never did and I ended up tossing it. Took about 2 weeks to settle back down.

I'm still loyal to the COSRX brand but learned a valuable lesson not to try to fix what's not broken! I'll stick to my usual regimen (Cica cleansing oil, snail mucin gel cleanser, The retinol oil, snail peptide eye cream, snail mucin power essence, snail all in one cream, and the vitalizing sunscreen for daytime)

content: I was a little worried about getting an AHA because in the past my skin had been really dried out by them and I have oily skin. I started using once every other day and after seeing no peeling I upped it to 2 days on 1 day off. I am aware some AHA’s and BHA’s will cause peeling and that’s its way of shedding the old skin however, other AHA’s went way beyond that and I was not seeing results of all the peeling after 2 months. title: COSRX Niacinamide 2% + BHA 4% Blackhead Exfoliant Toner 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml, Korean Toner, Blackhead Remover, Pore Minimizer for Enlarged Pores, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
content: I struggle with clogged pores on my nose. I wouldn’t exactly call them blackheads, it would be more accurate to say I have a lot of dried up sebum that clogs the pores and if I don’t remove it then I get blackheads. Many of the products I’ve used have worked, but in turn caused a lot of damage to my skin barrier. After years of neglecting my skin due to depression my pores became very large and clog up within a few days if I don’t stay on top of things. This product has been a game changer. I find that it performs just as well as the Paula’s Choice Liquid Exfoliant, and at a portion of the price. I did find the product was not as drying as the Paula’s Choice either, but this product does feel a bit oily. If you use too much you’ll notice your skin feels a bit slick, so use sparingly, and really a little goes a long way. I have noticed not only does this shrink my pores, and diminish blackheads, but it also helps with extractions. I apply this product, allow it to sit for 15-20 minutes, then go in with my extraction tool and let me tell you…the amount of junk that comes out of my pores is insane! I’ve been able to remove some of the more difficult sebum plugs from my nose with little to no effort after using this product, and I’m referring to plugs that I haven’t been able to remove for months. Some of the pores that have been clogged I would try with tools, cleansers, exfoliants, and even my fingers but I would only damage the skin trying to remove them, and yet THIS👏🏻 PRODUCT 👏🏻 removed those stubborn little bastards effortlessly. I used my tool after applying this and the sebum plugs just glide right out in one piece. I had some really large ones in the crease of my nostrils come out that unbeknownst to me were so bad they looked similar to a grain of rice when I removed them. I had no idea how much junk was hiding deep inside my pores! This is powerful stuff! I’d like to note however, that I have pretty oily, resilient skin, and it takes a really strong product to cause damage to my skin, so where I haven’t noticed much drying or redness I do think that people with sensitive skin should use caution with this product and invest in a barrier protection cream to use in conjunction. There were a few times I over exfoliated with my spin brush and noticed some burning/redness on the sensitive parts so if you’re a person who reacts to stronger products you’re going to want something to combat that effect on your skin. But if you have normal to oily skin, and struggle with blackheads, whiteheads, sebum filaments, clogged pores and the like this is the product for you! I still have almost a full bottle of the Paula’s Choice and every single time I find myself reaching for this instead. I find it works better, and because of the price I don’t feel that I need to ration so carefully. I can just use what I feel I need to use without worrying what the dollar value of the amount of product I just applied was. It’s a nice big bottle that lasts forever, and the squirt cap seems to portion out the product perfectly! I can’t say enough about this product! I am so glad I gave it a try!

content:
This easily became a staple in my night-time and pre-makeup routines. I've been using this product for about a year, and from what I've observes, THIS was the product in my routine that reduced small bumps on my cheek and forehead.

I have oily skin, especially around my T-zone, and used Dapsone gel to help prevent acne (which was recommended by my dermatologist). The product did not interfere with any of my other acne products. This is definitely shiny and will leave you looking like a glazed donut, so it's not a morning routine product, unless you're applying it before your makeup and would like a dewy look. Let it fully dry before you start applying other products. Not sure why it's gotten more expensive over the last year, but I'd still consider it a good product.

content:

(No offense) Many drugstore products yield better results.
One real gripe is the spray nozzle… it sprays so much out and in 2inch circumference circle. You have to spray about three times to get your whole face and then move it around. It feels like an assault on your face I spray, not enjoyable. Forget about a refreshing spray over makeup during the day, it would ruin your whole face.

title: COSRX Alcohol-Free Cica Toner, 150ml / 5.07 fl.oz | Spray-type Korean Toner with Centella Asiatica for Hydrating & Soothing Redness | Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
content:
I love CosRx products so I will use all of this and be happy I ordered it. I do also love Beauty of Joseon ginseng toner/essence, or Belif milky toner. However, this one does help with redness and isn't overloaded with ingredients. I find though that it isn't quite as hydrating as my other toners but it gives me a nice glow.

In fact, the more I use it, the more I like it. It goes very well with my snail mucin. It also goes well with BOJ ginseng essence/toner if I want to double up, and then some BOJ ginseng/snail mucin. These combinations really knock out the rosacea redness and give me a nice glow of healthy skin.

A tip: if you want to spray this on your face but not your eyes, put some old reading glasses on and spray away - the glasses will keep it out of your eyes and then you just wash or wipe off the glasses. I have a cheap pair of reading glasses that I only use for this - works great! No more product in eyes!

I ordered this after watching a podcast by one of the skin care 'influencers' - I do believe this one was either a derm or a skincare specialist talking up centella asiatica products as good for rosacea, which I do have some rosacea-prone redness on my cheeks from Type 1 rosacea.

Centella asiatica is great for inflammation and redness and perhaps hydration too.

If I continue to like it as much as I am finding over the last week or so, I'm ordering more when this is halfway done!

title: COSRX Alcohol-Free Cica Toner, 150ml / 5.07 fl.oz | Spray-type Korean Toner with Centella Asiatica for Hydrating & Soothing Redness | Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2024
content:
The spray is light and soothing, no stickiness, not drying, doesn’t irritate acne, new piercings or skin flare ups. The sent is very light but pleasant.

There are mixed thoughts on the main ingredient (Asiatica leaf water) being beneficial without other ingredients: asiatic acid, madecassic acid, asiaticoside, and madecassoside.
Possibly those are all included in this product as part of the Asiatica leaf water and not listed, although they are listed in other COSRX products.
I did notice my skin seems smoother and occasional acne I get is less red but there are always multi factors with skin changes.

I’d probably go for their other Asiatica toner next to see if the added ingredients make a difference.

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
content:
Centella asiatica is the first ingredient and it really makes this cream calming and soothing for when my skin is red and irritated. There is a white cast, but it does fade and I use this when I know I am not going to be out with people. I also love using this product to get rid of pimples since it does not dry out skin like products with benzoyl peroxide.

I have mild acne so I am not sure how effective this would be for someone who has severe acne. Overall, I would recommend this and the jar last awhile since this is mostly a spot treatment. Last thing to note is I apply my moisturizer first and then this at the end so my face stays hydrated. I will be repurchasing when I run out of this cream.

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free

It goes on thick and ashy like zinc based products. For some reason, I was expecting a light cream. I am sure it's effective, but the texture and appearance are not for me. I am African American with richly melanated skin. If I needed this for acne, I would wear at night so I wouldn't have to deal with white cast during the day.

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free

I have cystic acne breakouts and stubborn acne on my chin and jawline, which is aggravated by wearing a mask for 8-12 hours a day, depending on the length of my workday. I reduced the amount of products I was using on my face and use this cream at night after my toner and then apply a more moisturizing cream on top. I sometimes even use this as a spot treatment on red spots during the day, after my toner and before my sunscreen. Overall it’s worked well for me and I will continue to use it at night.

content:
It became my instant must have! Instant! I use it at night, because it does leave some white cast...but lately also just under my mask...because why not. It calms my angry red blemishes overnight. When I feel the urge to tuch, scrach those blemishes, i put a tini bit on, and it's instantly calm...still red and all, but not itchy, so i don't irritate it further. AND THEN one day i woke up with that first tingle of a cold sore. If you ever had one, you know what i mean. I figured, well what the heck! Listen!!! It went away! Like gone! Like it did NOT!!! Come out! At! All!
I figured well, maybe it was a an accident. So a month later I felt the same tingle, but i was at work...no cream with me. Still i put it on at home once the sore was all read and present...and it dried off. Mind! It's there. But if you ever had cold sores, you know that it's ichy, then scabs up...then f.ing bleeds and than slowly goes away. Not this time. It did not get inflamated and scabby at all, just kinda managably dry. (See picture) I just bought my second jar to keep in my purse for emergencies!
I'm an over explainer, so thanks for reading! XD

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2020
content:
So I bought this product a few months ago and tried it but didn’t really see any results. I have been using it off and on over the last few months to try and determine if it helps or not.

I had almost given up on this but I had one large and painful blemish that had just popped up on my chin and I was desperate to get rid of it. I put a thick layer of this on and went to bed. When I woke up, it was almost gone.

I’m still trying it out to see how it works best but it seems to help the most with inflamed pimples under the skin rather than whiteheads or popped pimples. It’s a little annoying to apply because it definitely leaves white spots on your face so they recommend to use it at night. The only problem with using it at night is that it doesn’t dry down so it wipes off really easily on your pillowcase. I have been applying it in the evening a few hours before bed so it has time to work before it is wiped off on my pillowcase.

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
content:
This blemish cream visibly reduced both my redness and inflammation. You can expect to see results quite quickly. The morning after using this product, my skin was so soothed and much more even in tone. I thoroughly recommend this product to people who struggle with acne and redness because this cream made my acne scars less prominent and my overall skin less red.

Many reviewers found issues with a white cast. However, I found that the cream blended into my skin effortlessly. I suspect people with this specific qualm used too much of this product because I can see how layering more product can leave a white base. You do not and should not use a lot of this cream because a little goes a long way in addition to it being an objectively small amount of product.

The cream consistency is interesting because you would expect it to be heavy. With the way I apply it to my skin, the cream does not sit on top of the skin. Like aforementioned, it easily melted into the skin without clogging my pores.

Is it an essential product for the everyday person? No. But people who feel insecure about their redness and inflammation that comes from acne will enjoy this product.

title: COSRX Centella Blemish Cream, 1.05 fl.oz / 30g | Centella | Korean Skin Care, Vegan, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2020
content:
This is an authentic product! It is NOT fake. :)

The spot treatment seems to work fairly well on acne spots that occasionally crop up on my face. I usually have a few whiteheads which, after using the treatment at night, will disappear typically overnight. The most stubborn spots disappear from 24-48 hours with very minimal hyperpigmentation.

What is most impressive is how effective it is in calming irritation. I occasionally see a streak of red irritation on my cheek/jawline area after using the very strong AHA/BHA mask from The Ordinary once a week. At night, after rinsing off The Ordinary mask, I apply toner/essence (one from COSRX called the Centella Water Alcohol-Free Toner mist, and another from Pyunkang Yul called the Essence Toner) to hydrate my skin. I follow up with moisturizer (Belif's True Cream Aqua Bomb) and then apply this spot treatment onto the red, irritated area. Overnight, the redness and irritation are gone!

My only minor gripe with the product is that it is fairly thick and opaque, and it does not absorb into the skin. Rather, it sits on top of the skin, and rubbing the product will only move it around onto the skin rather than working it INTO the skin. My solution is to use very little product and generally only use it at night. A little goes a long way with this stuff! Overall, I love it and think it's great for the price point. My boyfriend uses a way more expensive brand and, after trying my tub of COSRX spot treatment, has stated that after he goes through his expensive tube he'll just switch to COSRX instead!

title: COSRX Acne Pimple Patch (96) Absorbing Hydrocolloid Original 3 Size Patches for Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body, Not Tested on Animals
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2024
content:
Effectiveness: 9/10. These things make my whiteheads VANISH overnight without fail. It is the only foolproof way I know of, to get rid of a gross whitehead without popping it and risking aggravating it further. My pics show a small pimple, but I have used these patches on some real monsters and they work like a charm every time. I have used it on cystic acne (spots with no head), and it doesn’t have the same overnight-vanishing effect - but I would say it at least makes them a little less angry. So when I have a cystic bump, I’ll use a patch on it nightly, and it seems to go away a bit faster than normal.

Comfort: 10/10. So comfortable I’ve walked outside wearing it before by accident. They stay on very well overnight. The different sizes make it possible to use them pretty much anywhere. The only time they’re hard to use is if you get a pimple like on the corner of your lip, close to your eye, or in a place where the patch can’t fully adhere to the skin around the pimple. In those cases, it’s still usable, but you have to be careful so it doesn’t fall off.

Durability: 10/10. They’ve never ripped on me, and the packet they come in is resealable which makes them last a long time.

Appearance: 5/10. Similar to other brands of pimple patches, these things are definitely noticeable when worn. I only use them at nighttime, so this doesn’t really affect me.

Overall an amazing solution for getting rid of whiteheads in a fast, pain-free, and sanitary way.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Face Cleanser, 5.07 fl oz, BHA Face Wash, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care, Korean Face Wash
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2024
content:
The COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is a total game-changer in my skincare routine! I have sensitive, combination skin, and it’s hard to find a cleanser that cleans without stripping my face. This one ticks all the boxes—it’s gentle, effective, and leaves my skin feeling refreshed without any tightness.

The low pH formula really helps maintain my skin’s balance, which is important to avoid breakouts and irritation. I also love that it contains tea tree oil and BHA, which keep my pores clear and calm any redness. Even though it’s called a “morning” cleanser, I use it both day and night, and it works beautifully every time.

The gel texture feels soothing, and it lathers just the right amount without being too foamy. Plus, the 150 ml bottle lasts a long time since a little bit goes a long way. It’s also fragrance-free, which is a bonus for those with sensitive skin or anyone avoiding strong scents.

If you’re looking for a reliable, gentle daily cleanser that works for all skin types—especially sensitive or acne-prone—this one is a must-try! I’ll definitely be repurchasing.

title: COSRX Oil Free Lotion with Birch Sap, Daily Acne Facial Moisturizer, Hydrating Moisturizer for All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care, Paraben free, 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2024
content:
I decided to give this a try because of the reviews and I was looking for a new moisturizer. I suffer from very oily skin so finding a moisturizer that doesn’t add more oil to my face has been a mission.

I can say that I’m not disappointed. My skin wasn’t sensitive to this. It does the job it’s meant to do. I purchased it with their snail mucin product but it wasn’t a great combination for my skin. I’d get very red. After trying them separate I determined it was the snail mucin my skin responded to and not the moisturizer.

The only thing I don’t like is the smell. Not sure how I can describe it but I know it’s good that it’s not full of scents because that’s also bad. It’s not sticky or leaves any oily residue. My minus is only the smell, but it could be that my nose is just more sensitive to this scent. So please don’t feel discouraged to purchase if your thinking about it.

I will be purchasing this again for future moisturizer needs.

content:
I'm a guy and don't like stuff/residue on my face so I avoided facecare products. I have an oily T-zone and my skin is a bit sensitive so I wanted something without bad ingredients. I looked at tons of products and decided to look at more Korean skin care products and found this one and a few others but decided on this one.

The app I used to check products is Yuka and they scored it 100/100, which is the best I found compared to the large brand name products. I just started using it less than a week ago after my shower and it is great. There is basically no grease residue left on my face after 30 minutes to an hour.

3.38 fl. oz. does seem to be a bit small but for the price and compared to other moisturizers from large brand names it is very competitive.

Overall, great for combining skin.

title: COSRX Oil Free Lotion with Birch Sap, Daily Acne Facial Moisturizer, Hydrating Moisturizer for All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care, Paraben free, 3.38 fl.oz / 100ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2024
content:
I was searching for a new unscented and lightweight moisturizer when I stumbled upon this. I didn’t have any expectations going into this product purchase - but I’ve been very happy with it.

The product absorbs very quickly and makes my face feel plump and hydrated. It’s also lightweight enough to be used directly on my eyes and eyelids, adding to the product’s versatility.

It’s very affordable and feels like it’s formulated with quality ingredients. The bottle has a pump that makes it very easy to dispense and a little goes a long way. The bottle is sizeable and lasts a long time.

I haven’t had any issues with breakouts besides a few small pimples when I first started using it. All skin care products can come with an adjustment period - so I’d encourage giving it at least 1-2 weeks to see how effective it is for your skin.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Face Moisturizer, 3.52 Oz, Lightweight Moisturing Cream for Soft, Glowy Skin, Korean Skin Care, Korean Moisturizer Face Cream
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2025
content:
Confession: I'm a middle-aged guy who, until recently, thought skincare involved nothing more than bar soap and the occasional squirt of sunscreen.

But thanks to my girlfriend's gentle nudging (and maybe a few too many comments about my "dry patches"), I've entered the skincare world. And let me tell you, this COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer is a revelation, particularly for someone who lives at high altitudes.

Here's why I'm now a snail mucin convert:

Hydration Hero: This stuff is like a tall glass of water for my face. It absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling hydrated and plump without any greasy residue. My dry patches have vanished, and my skin looks noticeably healthier.

Surprisingly Lightweight: I was worried about a thick, heavy cream, but this moisturizer is remarkably lightweight. It feels refreshing on my skin and doesn't clog my pores.

Visible Results: I've been using this moisturizer for a few weeks, and I can honestly say my skin looks and feels better. It's smoother, more even-toned, and has a healthy glow I haven't seen in years.

No Fuss, No Frills: As a skincare newbie, I appreciate the simplicity of this moisturizer. It's fragrance-free and contains no harsh ingredients that might irritate my skin.

Girlfriend-Approved: Most importantly, my girlfriend has noticed an improvement in my skin. That's a win in my book!

A Few Slimy (Minor) Considerations:

While I'm a big fan of this moisturizer, there are a couple of things to keep in mind based on other reviews:

The Snail Factor: Yes, it's made with snail mucin. This might not be your moisturizer if you're squeamish about that sort of thing. But trust me, it's not as slimy as it sounds!

Not for Everyone: While it works wonders for my dry skin, some reviewers with oily skin have found it a bit too rich. If you're unsure, it's always a good idea to do a patch test first.

Overall:

If you're looking for a hydrating, lightweight moisturizer that delivers visible results, the COSRX Snail Mucin 92% Moisturizer is a fantastic choice. It's been a game-changer for my skin, and I highly recommend it to anyone, especially fellow middle-aged guys new to the skincare world.

content:
I have been searching for a product to use on my chemo damaged face. Everything I’ve tried so far gives me a chemical type burn after a couple days of use, if not immediately.
I’ve been using this product for a week and I love the moisture, glow and protective layer it gives my skin. The cooling gel feels soo good on my skin. I apply it at night and then again mid day because my skin is so dry and damaged. It’s soothing and absorbs nicely into my skin. It has a sticky texture when you first apply it but as you rub it in it absorbs nicely.
Great quality, comes with a lot of product (it doesn’t take a lot to cover face and neck).
Definitely will be purchasing once I run out.

content:
Okay, so I'm so into skin care. I have tried hundreds of things, and I love to try new things.
Never have I tried a product that I could see the difference after the very first use—until I got to this cream.
I see my face brighter, the texture is more even, and my skin color looks radiant. I really can't believe it.
I feared it would smell funny or feel meh, but no! I love the smell and the texture of the cream, which is as described.
You can apply your make-up perfectly after using this cream.

Did I say already that I'm impressed? :) I love this product! I'm happy I ran into it by luck!

title: COSRX BHA Toner Pads, 70 Sheets, Exfoliating Pads for Dead Skin & Blackheads, Minimize Pores, Prevent Breakouts, Improve Skin Texture, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2024
content: I’ve been using stridex pads for a while and they actually work well for cheap drug store pads. They are a little strong for everyday so I wanted something I could use every morning cause for my skin it needs almost constant exfoliation or it gets rough/dull and pores get clogged. Only complaint I have is that they aren’t very wet, I wish they were a little more saturated bc when I get down to my neck they are already feeling dryer. Where with the stridex pads they are nice and soaked and I can get a ton of skin wiped down. But these are great for a gentle everyday exfoliating pad. They’re not a bad price either. -Edit* so update after using these for a few weeks. They are an ok toner pad don’t get me wrong, great if you have sensitive skin. I just won’t be repurchasing bc I didn’t see any improvement in my blackheads or white heads or overall texture bc my skins used to stronger actives and these are almost too gentle for me.

date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
content: I wanted to make sure I used this product for a bit before giving it a review. Overall, I don’t hate it but I also don’t love it either. Things I do like is that the pads have both a textured side and a smooth side. I like to use the textured side first to really exfoliate my skin and then flip it over and let the extracts soak into my skin for 5 mins. There isn’t a super strong smell and overall gentle on my skin. My skin is pretty sensitive so it breaks out pretty easily. Which brings me to my next point. I did feel like my pores were slightly smaller but didn’t do much to help with my existing acne. It’s still in my rotation but I reach for the abib pads a little more.

content: Cosrx BHA is one of the most well known products from Cosrx. I wasn't a fan of their BHA power liquid back in the day and I primarily exfoliate with AHAs, so I decided to try this out by purchasing it during Prime Day. It's really convenient, comes with a tweezer so you can use it to pick up the pads conveniently & without contaminating all the pads. title: COSRX BHA Toner Pads, 70 Sheets, Exfoliating Pads for Dead Skin & Blackheads, Minimize Pores, Prevent Breakouts, Improve Skin Texture, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
content:
If your skin is anything like mine, (NEEDS acids, HUGE pores ((genetic)), oily but so congested that it doesn’t absorb moisturizing agents and ends up feeling dry even though it’s actually dull from product and congestion, lol, (I’ve attached a picture. You can see my pores that’s how big they are. then, this will be your holy grail.

This is the most gentle but effective salicylic acid pad I’ve ever used. It’s pleasant to use after cleansing, leaving you feeling fresh faced, but your skin won’t get tight! I knew this brand was trustworthy, but this product is next level. Ive not had one breakout since using these pads, and my pores are sooo much cleaner, and my blackheads are gone. I feel like it’s not compromising my already damaged moisture barrier, too. AND, this allows my skin to absorb my moisturizing product better. Just buy it. Especially if you have dehydrated skin that acts anything like mine.

title: COSRX BHA Toner Pads, 70 Sheets, Exfoliating Pads for Dead Skin & Blackheads, Minimize Pores, Prevent Breakouts, Improve Skin Texture, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX BHA Toner Pads, 70 Sheets, Exfoliating Pads for Dead Skin & Blackheads, Minimize Pores, Prevent Breakouts, Improve Skin Texture, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
content:
I know CosRx is a good brand but buying it off Amazon sketched me out a little... I got lucky I guess!
VERY PLEASED like wooooooow.
I went to esthetician school so I consider myself pretty well-versed but I never get too far into acids, they can be very harsh. I don't have oily skin so I can't take too much damage but with my stubborn skin texture I was trying to branch out and wow I am so glad I did!!!
I am not someone who deals with acne or blemishes on a daily basis so I cant speak to that... but I have tried SO MANY products for my chin area where the coloration is off and flaking always occurs and nothing has done what this product does!!!
Within ONE FREAKING DAY my skin was different!!! I have dry/normal skin and was very nervous this would dry me out but I use it literally every day and its AMAZING. It evened out my overall tone and within one week of using it now, I cant even remember what my skin looked like before! I will be buying these for the rest of my life :D

title: COSRX BHA Toner Pads, 70 Sheets, Exfoliating Pads for Dead Skin & Blackheads, Minimize Pores, Prevent Breakouts, Improve Skin Texture, Korean Skin Care

It's moisturizing, and clears the residual makeup that doesn't come off with my Cerave Wash and water.

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2022
content: I originally purchased for my son’s acne. While he was using it to great success, I had the worst flair of my life of Seborrheic Dermatitis. Desperate as my class reunion was days away, I started using this twice a day as it as salicylic acid like properties. In two days the texture was vastly improved and flakes were minimal- by the forth day, the flaking, burning and itching were all gone. All that was left was mild redness that was easily covered with my medium coverage foundation. I continued to use this after the symptoms were gone as I also noticed improved skin texture and less definition in my wrinkles. I am ordering 2 more cans/ One for me and another for my son. He is also seeing a reduction in his acne scars.

I’ve tried to use other toner pads when I couldn’t get these ones after my years worth of them, and other brands irritated my eyes or had too much fragrance added into it. date: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2024
content:
I have mild-ish rosacea - that is, I get very red and struggle with large pores - but not necessary and orange peel texture. My goal was to find a product to minimize pores, tone skin, and avoid any irritation or additional redness. This fit the bill perfectly.

I use this as the only abrasive in my routine. Bioderma cleaning oil for makeup removing, La Roche Posay foam cleanser, followed by the pads, and then moving onto serum and moisturizer. I have noticeably improved my skin since using these pads and will absolutely repurchase.

content: It’s rare to find a product that really changes the skin texture but this one definitely softens the skins to the touch and gives a comfortable feeling to facial skin. title: COSRX Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask, 60ml / 2.02 fl.oz | Rice Extract 68% and Niacinamide 2% | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2024
content: The cosrx brand never irritates me. I’ve tried their snail mucin collection but I feel it didn’t really do anything for me. But THIS however, is so hydrating!! I left it on overnight then washed my face & moisturized in the morning and I still have that dewy look and my skin is so soft. I’ve always had sensitive combination skin so usually when I wake up, my forehead is oily and around my mouth is dry and flaky. I’ve only used it once so far (last night), but when I woke up today my face was so moisturized I didn’t even want to wash it lol. Also I’m so glad it didn’t tingle or irritate my sensitive skin at all! I’m still feeling the hydration from the mask the night before. Also, I see a lot of people complaining about the stickiness but it’s not a bad slimy sticky, but a super moisturizing sticky. So it won’t bother you when trying to sleep. Or make you look funny when going to bed. Highly recommend!

title: COSRX Ultimate Nourishing Rice Overnight Spa Mask, 60ml / 2.02 fl.oz | Rice Extract 68% and Niacinamide 2% | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2024
content:
I normally don’t write reviews instead I’m the one reading hundreds of them. If your like me , you like to thoroughly do your reach especially when it comes to what you put on or in your body .

This face mask is absolutely under priced . I’m in shock just how well this face mask works !!!!!!! I have tried pretty much every line of skin care once . I’m only on day 3 and I wake up each time with my skin literally transforming over night . I did not realize of all my years of research and thousands spent on my skin regime that something as a nourishing RICE mask was the key component that was lacking . 😂

The texture is a hybrid between a serum and a moisturizer. It goes on creamy like silk , non greasy or heavy what so ever . No scent which I like as I have sensitive skin . Even vitamin C dries me out . I’m on the super dry end of skin types so this is Definitely a wonderful overnight hydrate . I wake up with Baby soft , dewy , poreless skin . It’s actually brightening it too to my surprise. (I don’t find many brightened that actually work on the market anymore unless it’s clinical & you’re ready to shell out $200+.)

I do want to note that I do use other products first BUT it’s the same steps I was doing when I would finish with the laneig water bank sleep mask . I did not have any results with that after a week I gave it to my bf and back to the drawing board looking for a deep hydrating over night mask . I found this one and I needed to share my feedback . There is probably someone out there like me just over the search and wasted money .

This mask is simply incredible. There is no other way to put it . I even canceled my laser facial as it’s no longer needed . 3 days my skin has drastically improved from elasticity , brightened and super moisturized .

Dont take this review lightly . I’m a super tough critic when it comes to skin & hair products. Every woman mid 30’s+ with dry skin needs this in her nightly skin routine . 🙌

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Cream, Long-lasting Hydration, Rich Moisturizer for Sensitive Skin 3.52 oz / 100g, Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Parabens Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2024
content:
!The COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Cream has completely transformed my skincare routine! I have sensitive, dry skin that tends to get flaky, especially in colder months, and I’ve tried countless moisturizers. None have delivered the lasting hydration and soothing comfort that this cream provides.

Intense Hydration: This cream is packed with hyaluronic acid, which locks in moisture so effectively that my skin feels soft and plump all day. Even in dry weather, it keeps my face hydrated without needing to reapply. It absorbs quickly, so there’s no greasy residue—just a beautiful, dewy finish.

Perfect for Sensitive Skin: With no parabens, artificial fragrances, or animal testing involved, this product is gentle on sensitive skin. I’ve had no irritation or breakouts since using it, and it actually calms my skin if it feels tight or red. This cream is one of the few products I trust to use around my eyes because it’s so gentle!

Rich but Lightweight Texture: Although it’s a rich moisturizer, the texture is lightweight and non-sticky. It glides on smoothly and layers well under makeup without pilling. This is a huge plus for my morning routine as it makes my foundation look smoother and fresher for longer.

Long-Lasting and Affordable: A little goes a long way, so this 3.52 oz tub lasts for months, making it incredibly affordable for the quality you get. I’ve been using it daily for weeks, and I’m not even halfway through the jar.

Korean Skincare Quality: COSRX is a reliable brand in Korean skincare, known for its high-quality ingredients, and this product lives up to that reputation. The hyaluronic acid blend is highly effective, and I love that it’s cruelty-free.

If you have dry, sensitive skin or need a hydration boost, I can’t recommend the COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizing Cream enough. It’s become an absolute staple in my skincare, and I’ll definitely be repurchasing!

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content:
I've been using this clarifying treatment toner for about a week now, and I'm giving it 3 stars because I'm still on the fence about its effectiveness. Initially, I was excited to try this product as it promised to balance my skin's pH and reduce acne. However, after using it consistently for 2 weeks, I've started to experience a breakout - which is the opposite of what I was hoping for.

That being said, I do think this toner has helped to reduce the appearance of pores and has left my skin feeling clean and refreshed. The breakout could be due to a purging phase, but I'm not entirely sure.

I'll continue to use this product and see how my skin adjusts, but for now, I can only give it an average rating. If you're considering trying this toner, I'd recommend starting with a small patch test to see how your skin reacts.

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner 5.07 fl.oz/ 150ml, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, & Uneven Skin, Korean Toner, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2024
content:
The COSRX AHA/BHA Clarifying Treatment Toner is a popular skincare product designed to gently exfoliate, hydrate, and refine the skin. It’s particularly loved for its lightweight formula and effectiveness in improving skin texture.

Key Features:

• Ingredients: Contains AHAs (Alpha Hydroxy Acids) and BHAs (Beta Hydroxy Acids) to exfoliate and unclog pores. Also includes soothing ingredients like allantoin.
• Benefits: Helps reduce dullness, control oil, and prevent breakouts while promoting smoother skin.
• Usage: Apply after cleansing with a cotton pad or by patting onto the skin, typically used in the evening.
• Skin Types: Suitable for most skin types but particularly beneficial for oily, acne-prone, or uneven skin.

Would you like tips on how to incorporate it into your routine, or are you considering purchasing it? Let me know how I can help!

date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2024
content:
I really wanted to like this toner as I LOVE all of my other COSRX products (the snail mucin is THE BEST). But this toner is in a spray bottle, which is odd, but I decided to give it a chance. This toner dries WAY too fast, so you have to use so much for it to get where it needs to go. I’m talking 7 pumps directly on my face and another 3-4 pumps on a cotton round and it still dried out too fast. I went through a bottle of this stuff in about 2 and a half weeks. I can usually make any other toner last a little over one month.

As for the effects it had on my skin, I didn’t see a noticeable difference from the toner I was using previously. I wouldn’t say it was bad, but it also wasn’t anything to rave about. Overall, I didn’t think the longevity was worth the price.

content: I like these better than the invisible Mighty Patch for multiple reasons: smaller, easier to blend in with concealer, more effective, and less expensive. title: COSRX Clear Fit Master Patch 18 Patches | Healing Pimple Patches for Blemishes and Zits | Hydrocolloid Dressing | Quick & Easy Spot Treatment
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
content: These patches work great for covering open blemishes, which allows me to put makeup on them without the makeup aggravating the open wound. I don't use these for fighting acne because plain hydrocolloid patches don’t fight acne. Their job is to cover an open wound to help keep it clean and to turn any fluid seeping out of the wound into that white gel. I’ve seen people put these patches on closed pimples on their face and think that the white gel that formed on the patch is pus that somehow got sucked out of their pimple. Hydrocolloid doesn’t magically seep into the skin and then pull pimple gunk out onto the patch. You can actually put one of these patches on a clear part of your face and the natural oils that seep out from your skin will turn into the white gel substance on the patch. So all in all, I think these patches work great for what they were intended for. (FYI, my included review image doesn’t show the entire amount of patches I received in the package. I’ve used an entire row of them already.)

title: COSRX Clear Fit Master Patch 18 Patches | Healing Pimple Patches for Blemishes and Zits | Hydrocolloid Dressing | Quick & Easy Spot Treatment
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2020
content:
These are by far THE BEST pimple patches for day-time wear! I have tried a number of different brands (Iconic Cosmetic, Peach Slices, another one CVS carries, and even the CosRX patches that come in the red package) and none of them compare. Most patches say they are invisible, but they are not. These patches were so invisible that I could not even see them on my own face!

Most patches also say they can be work under makeup, but end up looking very obvious with some foundation over them. These weren't invisible once I out foundation over them, but blended in much better than any other patch.

They also hold up pretty well with sweat and friction. I wore two during a 75 minute Muay Thai session that included sparring and, while they rippled a little and became somewhat less invisible, they stayed on well.

THE ONE DOWNSIDE: they are hard to get off the packaging without crinkling the patch (which makes it more noticable). You need to have fingernails and you need to be very careful. They also are more expensive than other patches. In light of that, I suggest using the red CosRX or iconic brand patches at night and saving these babies for bad days when you need some day-time coverage.

date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
content:
I got this roughly two months ago as a part of my quest to “fix” my skin. I’m in my mid-30s, and was fortunate to have relatively problem-free skin for most of my life. That all changed in the past year, likely due to a double whammy of stress and aging. I swear my skin aged at least 5-10 years during that time. I was breaking out regularly, and every painful cystic acne spot would turn into hyperpigmentation. Along with lamenting the damage being done to my skin, I noticed how horrible my pores had become - they were huge, and my fave was riddled with blackheads. I started trying everything I could - LED therapy, religiously using tretinoin, but then I decided to “go nuclear” with a laser treatment which only made my skin worse. Dejected, I decided to “go back to the basics”, and try to figure out what habits I could build that would improve my situation a little bit each day.
Long story short, I learned about Cosrx on Reddit when someone posted their results after using the blackhead power liquid. I did my research and learned that the ingredient they use to clear blackheads is ever so slightly different than most, and that makes it more effective. Well, Amazon was sold out of the blackhead liquid, and I was desperate, so I decided to go for this since the active ingredients are similar. I’m so glad I have this a try! It has definitely worked! It hasn’t completely eliminated my blackheads, but wow - they’ve definitely drastically reduced from what they used to be. I used to apply it with a reusable facial round, but now I apply it directly with my fingers, and I feel like it helps the product go farther, and actually be more effective since nearly 100% of it is going directly on my skin rather than absorbing into the facial round. It’s also incredibly gentle on my skin. I get no irritation at all. I’ve read about the importance of letting your products do their work before layering the next product on top, so I also allow this to sit for 20 minutes before I apply the next product. Yes, this means my routine takes longer, so, I now keep my products next to my bed and apply them at night before sleep while I watch some TV. For the price, this is a “holy grail” product I will continue to use, though I may give the blackhead one a go once I run out of this to see if there’s much of a difference between the two. In about two and a half months of near-daily use, I’ve gone through about a half a bottle, so I expect this to last me a while longer. For me, this makes it an excellent value. Every time I find a product like this that helps me get back skin that I don’t have to be quite so embarrassed about it’s a blessing. If your concerns are similar, I say give it a try.

title: COSRX Two in One Poreless Power Liquid, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz | Tightening Pores | Korean Skincare, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
content:
I recently purchased the COSRX Two in One Poreless Power Liquid and I have been blown away by the results. This product has truly lived up to its name - my pores have been visibly reduced in size and my skin feels much smoother and more hydrated.

One thing that really stands out to me about this product is that it has not caused any sensitivity or irritation on my skin. Many products that claim to shrink pores tend to be quite harsh and strip the skin, but this one is very gentle and nourishing.

In addition to shrinking pores, this product has also helped to improve the overall texture and clarity of my skin. It feels much more balanced and healthy, and I am noticing a significant decrease in blemishes and breakouts.

Overall, I would highly recommend the COSRX Two in One Poreless Power Liquid to anyone looking to minimize the appearance of pores and improve the overall health and appearance of their skin. It has been an absolute game-changer for me and I will definitely be repurchasing in the future.

title: COSRX Two in One Poreless Power Liquid, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz | Tightening Pores | Korean Skincare, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
content:
I have always struggle with large pores, from both hormonal changes to unhealthy sleeping pattern. Basically if i stay up late, the next day my pores would be like moon craters, my skin would be super dried on some part and super oily around t zone. I don’t wear make up and don’t really know all steps of proper skin care so my pores were just getting worse and worse.
I have tried a lot of things, anything that claim to shrink your pores. Most of them had no effect whatsoever, a lot of them made me feel like they’re just plain water, they didn’t seem to do anything at all. Some other sting badly, gave me burning sensation.
This godsend Corsx liquid is different. It has cooling effect instead of stinging, and you can feel it working on your face, not like those “plain water”. It made my skin feel moist but not oily, and most important of all, it REALLY HELPS with the pores. They appear much much smaller. I don’t feel like a cratered moon anymore and i have only used it for a short time.
Better yet, it’s really afforable. So if you’re suffering from large pores, give it a try, i hope it would help you like it did to me.

title: COSRX Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream, 2.82 oz / 80g | Centella Asiatica Matte Balm | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
content:
I love the "plush-like" consistency when it glides on your skin, it turns creamy and soft so that it feels easier to apply. It doesn't have that thickness that you feel that makes you despise to use it. It is thick when it comes out of the tube but applies well on skin over damp skin. Great barrier cream. I would say I recommend to apply this after a toner so that it is much easier for the cream to 'glide onto' as opposed to a dry face. If you don't have one you can use it right after drying your face after a shower since the steam makes your face damp. - could also use it after serum too so there is some barrier for the cream to smooth onto. I tried it without a 'prep step' and it didn't feel nice and felt tacky to the touch.
For me I like using this as a second layer of moisturizer after an emulsion (light-weight moisturizer) as a thicker consistency night cream. I only use it at night.
I love how it is 80ml. I would definitely repurchase. I used a good amount of this for a couple of months for me to really see if I like it and to review. I purchased through the COSRX website.
I wanted ceramides in my skincare routine and I thought the best step would be moisturizer! it's an easy one too since it acts as a great barrier ingredient. Highly recommend.

title: COSRX Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream, 2.82 oz / 80g | Centella Asiatica Matte Balm | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
content:
To combat acne, I use 0.1% tretinoin, and I alternate between salicylic acid (1%) and benzoyl peroxide (2.5%) face washes. (My derm said both were okay, since they were wash off products.)

However, I noticed when I put on a regular, light weight moisturizer, my skin would sting a lot. I found out that this was because my skin barrier was damaged. I wear sunscreen, and don’t use any harsh chemical products, so I knew it was most likely due to my skin being too dry from my regular skincare routine. I figured my usual moisturizer wasn’t heavy enough to keep my skin hydrated. So I borrowed some of my boyfriends eczema cream from La Rochay Posay. It worked wonderfully, but I didn’t want to drop 15$ on a bottle for myself, so I looked for a cheaper alternative. When I bought it, this cream was cheaper (8$, what a steal!) Although it’s since gone back to its regular price (14$)

I love this product not only because it helped me repair my skin barrier, and keep my face hydrated, but also because I love the texture. It’s actually less like a cream, and more like a jelly. The consistency is a little bit similar to petroleum jelly, although not quite as “wet” as petroleum tends to be. And it glides on so smoothly. I only needed a pea-sized amount for my face. Once a day on most days, sometimes twice a day if my skin was super dry and irritated. Not to mention, the scent is a pleasant herbal smell. (No fragrance added tho!) I’ve also had no problems with it causing breakouts at all, despite the “heavy” consistency. Despite the price similarities, I would say I prefer this over the La Rochay Posay eczema cream, although both are great, high quality products.

title: COSRX Balancium Comfort Ceramide Cream, 2.82 oz / 80g | Centella Asiatica Matte Balm | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
content: Thanks 🙏

date: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2024
content:
I’ve been using the COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Essence for a few months now, and it’s been a game-changer for my skin. The lightweight, watery texture absorbs quickly, leaving my skin feeling hydrated but not sticky.

One of my favorite things about this essence is how gentle it is. It gives me that healthy, lit-from-within glow. I also appreciate how a little goes a long way—just a few drops are enough for my entire face. Product has great longevity. There is no scent.

The simple ingredients list is another win for me. It layers beautifully under other skincare products and works well in both my morning and evening routines.

If you’re looking to elevate your skincare game, I highly recommend this one.

title: COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Toner, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz, Moisturizing, Skin Soothing, Contains 95% Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024
content:
I don’t know if this product is to blame but shortly after using it I got the worst breakouts of my life and it’s several months later and it’s just now starting to stop.

For reference I’m early 30s, haven’t had break out since I was a teenager. I purchased this based on good anti-aging reviews. My skin was essentially very clear and glass like, I’m on the oilier side.

I started getting this tiny pimples that were like under the skin, not white head pimples but closed comedones. I have never dealt with this before in my life. They weren’t red or even noticeable so it didn’t concern me, but then each one has turned into a full blown white head, inflamed pimple that last weeks.

It’s been almost 2 months of it. I still have a few closed comedones and I’m terrified they will turn. Possibly fungal acne?

I can’t say this product caused it but I have never experienced anything like this before and this was the only real change in my routine. Discontinued use, no other effect noticed.

I do love this brand though. Have several other of their products I love!

title: COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Toner, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz, Moisturizing, Skin Soothing, Contains 95% Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Toner, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz, Moisturizing, Skin Soothing, Contains 95% Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2024
content: I was using Missha’s time revolution essence, but they kept changing the formula to the point that i just felt like i was paying for a bottle of water. So I decided to try this since I didn’t want to pay a fortune for the SK2. I used like 2 bottles of this day and night. It doesn’t seem to cause any irritations except when I used glycolic acid peel, it causes burning and redness after I used the 10% glycolic acid serum. It goes on sticky if you don’t put it on the cotton pad, so it’s not as refreshing as the Missha one. I noticed my face is more DRY and my skin peels during the day when I used this product (I use tretinoin at night). So this product is definitely not hydrating at all despite that it has sarchomyces filtrate and hyaluronic acid. My skin can’t tolerate hyaluronic acid bc it just sucks out all the moisture out of my face instead of making it more hydrated. After trying out 2 bottles of this (~3 months), u decided to stop using this. And ironically my skin is more moist and looks more radiant.

content: I saw a review of the main ingredient in this toning solution and had to try it. I have been complimented on my skin before, but lately more people seem to notice. title: COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Toner, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz, Moisturizing, Skin Soothing, Contains 95% Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2024
content: As someone who falls victim to social media almost every single day, I would have to say this product is OK. Now I’m not able to use snail mucin (by the same brand-cos rx) anymore as it does break me out, but I would say this product, in comparison, to that one is a bit overwhelming. Now this is a completely different formula and completely different concerns are targeted… This one I would say is most known for targeting wrinkles and age lines. Has very little hydration, very little help with dark spots but can help with texture (not including pores). If you’re someone who’s young and their skin is fairly in their prime, this may not target your concerns. I’m 24, and for me, this did almost absolutely nothing after using it since I bought it, so a couple of months. I did end up switching to the same brands hydration essence and am a lot happier. Make sure to pay attention and look up what essences are good for your concerns and not go to social media for everything- after hearing how good this was and was a dupe for a popular product I thought that it would help me more than it has!

date: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2024
content: First off I’m 40, with sensitive dry skin, worked in skincare for 10 years and have literally tried almost everything… no joke. This product is absolutely incredible. I felt a difference in the softness of my skin after the first try. A little tingle but I had just dermaplaned my face so that’s pretty normal. Once it dried (before I added the rest of my skincare) I felt lifted and smooth and really clean. This formula is super thin and a little goes a long way. I’ve added it into my routine morning and night and seen DRAMATIC changes in my skin’s texture and elasticity. I’ve also seen a lot of improvement in my stubborn hyperpigmentation. I immediately put this on subscription because I’ll use it until they stop making it. That’s three cosrx products that I can’t live without now… love this brand!

content: Got recommended this product and I’m so happy I tried it! It takes away my redness, makes my skin glow and baby soft. Only a few days using this product and the snail mucin cream, and I got complimented by 2 friends. It’s now been 2 weeks and the change in my skin is already noticed.

title: COSRX Galactomyces 95 Tone Balancing Toner, 100ml / 3.38 fl.oz, Moisturizing, Skin Soothing, Contains 95% Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate, For All Skin Types, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2024
content:
Bought this based on the reviews, and I've really been loving a lot of CosRX's products. This product has given me the smoothest skin of my life -- if you've ever had a chemical peel before, it's similar to when the peel has finally finished peeling and you have that super smooth, baby soft skin. It's incredible! There's no scent, it absorbs easily and quickly and leaves no tackiness, and other products sit on top beautifully. Two pumps allows me to fully get my entire face and neck, and the bottle itself is big & you get a lot of product.

I have also applied this to my body on the areas I get KP (thighs, bum, arms) and it seems to have helped with that as well. Huge fan of this, and I've been telling everyone about it! Highly recommend if you want smoother, brighter, calmer, happier skin!

content: This is not a fast acting thing. It’s lightened some of my facial dark spots a little, but not dramatically. However, the sun damage on my neck has had a much stronger effect. I do think my overall facial tone is a bit more uniform. I read that results can take a year. I think it’s well worth the price. I use it in combination with the snail mucin. After a few months of use I got several compliments about my youthful look. Not looking my age. Due to genetics this isn’t a completely new phenomenon, but it does seem more frequent.

content:
I recently purchased a popular essence product and unfortunately, I am quite disappointed with the experience. Upon receiving the package, I noticed that the essence liquid had leaked out, causing a mess and potential damage to other items. To my surprise, this issue seems to be a recurring problem, as I discovered through other customers' reviews. It is disheartening that despite this recurring issue, there has been no noticeable improvement in the product's packaging or quality control.

I must admit that the essence itself is of good quality, and its fast absorption provides an instant moisturizing effect. The formula lives up to its claims, delivering the desired benefits for the skin. However, the consistent problem of leakage during transit tarnishes the overall experience and raises concerns about the company's commitment to customer satisfaction.

title: COSRX 7% Glycolic Acid Whitehead Removing Power Liquid, 3.38 fl.oz, AHA Exfoliant, Exfoliating Toner for Face & Body, Pore Minimizer, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
content:
If I could give this product a million stars I would. I highly recommend this AHA for anyone struggling with whiteheads/closed comedones. I’ve been struggling with them for about 4 years and in 4 weeks, this AHA has done more for me than any of the many products I’ve tried in the last 4 years. One important thing to note is that it’s very important to apply it correctly. I stick to applying it only every other night (never in the morning) so as not to over exfoliate, immediately after cleansing (before toner, serum, etc), and I wait 20-30 minutes before applying the rest of my skincare. I wait that long because other products tend to have pH levels too close to natural skin pH, which can mess with the efficacy of the AHA so it will work best if you allow the AHA ample time to sit without interruption by other products. Seriously this changed the game for me!!

I have combination skin, and this didn’t break me out at all.

title: COSRX 7% Glycolic Acid Whitehead Removing Power Liquid, 3.38 fl.oz, AHA Exfoliant, Exfoliating Toner for Face & Body, Pore Minimizer, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
content:
I had gone to do a facial 2 months ago and she did a dermaplane which I’d never done before, at first it was great, but over two weeks, I realized this was something that irritated my skin so badly and I started getting horrible white heads and what looked like constant acne on the sides of my face and jawline where she dermaplaned. I tried everything, and it only got worse. I have sensitive skin, and prone to whiteheads because I’m athletic, but I’m meticulous about my skincare and I’ve never had a breakout like this since I was a wee teenager over 20 years ago!
Saw this at Marshall’s but didn’t think much, and I was skeptical about this, considering I’ve been able to manage existing whiteheads with exfoliation and extractions. But things got so bad, I decided to give this a shot.
One week in.. ALL of my whiteheads are gone! Literally. On first use, I noticed it immediately helped get rid of surface skin which allowed easier access to the gunk underneath. There was some tingling and minor irritation after using it once I exfoliated, but saw results immediately within first use. I used it every other day over the week, not recommending anyone do the same, but it’s completely cleared up my skin that was previously covered in whiteheads and bumps. It really just goes in and somehow gets rid of the surface skin that clogs my pores and allows the dirt causing my skin and whiteheads to just come out, without having to do any extractions or anything!
Cannot recommend this enough, so grateful for CORSX and their line of skincare products. Never have I found anything to help me get rid of my biggest issue until now, and I no longer pick or mess up my face :)

title: COSRX 7% Glycolic Acid Whitehead Removing Power Liquid, 3.38 fl.oz, AHA Exfoliant, Exfoliating Toner for Face & Body, Pore Minimizer, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
content:
Effective Whitehead Removal (5/5):
This power liquid means business when it comes to tackling whiteheads. The 7% glycolic acid exfoliates and unclogs pores, effectively removing whiteheads and promoting a smoother complexion.

Gentle Exfoliation (5/5):
Despite its potent formula, this power liquid provides exfoliation that is remarkably gentle on the skin. It doesn't cause irritation or excessive dryness, making it suitable for regular use.

Brightening Effect (5/5):
One of the standout features is the brightening effect it imparts. With regular use, my skin has become noticeably more radiant and even-toned. It's like having a natural glow!

Minimized Pores (5/5):
The AHA 7 Whitehead Power Liquid has helped reduce the appearance of pores, giving my skin a smoother and more refined texture. It's particularly effective on stubborn areas like the T-zone.

Non-Sticky Formula (5/5):
I appreciate that this power liquid has a non-sticky texture that absorbs easily into the skin. It doesn't leave any residue, allowing me to seamlessly incorporate it into my skincare routine.
