title: COSRX Hydrium Triple Hyaluronic Moisture Ampoule, 40ml / 1.35 fl.oz | Hyaluronic Acid Viscous Serum | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
content: This is a wonderful serum! I have sensitive skin with rosacea. I actually bought this for the polyhydroxy acids (gluconolactone and lactobionic acid) in this product for some gentle exfoliation, since my skin is way too sensitive for AHA and BHA toners. This product is so gentle yet effective! I use this at night, 3-4 times a week, and I wake up with glowing, supple skin. This has not caused any irritation whatsoever for me, which says something because I have very reactive skin. I recommend putting this on wet skin to help the HA work better and make the product less sticky, and follow up with your moisturizer. I will continue to buy this!

title: COSRX Hydrium Triple Hyaluronic Moisture Ampoule, 40ml / 1.35 fl.oz | Hyaluronic Acid Viscous Serum | Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2020
content: I have only used this product twice so far but i can already tell its a really good one. I have sensitive skin and it has not caused any irritation whatsoever. It also has no scent and no fragrance. I got it particularly for the ingredients, which are simple and effective, and its great that it has 3 forms of hyaluronic acid so it can penetrate your skin better and hydrate it from within. HA works best in the long term when using it consistently, so dont expect anything crazy overnight. I did however feel like my skin is more hydrated after using it at night. A few drops is more than enough, after tapping it in it does feel a little sticky but as soon as you put moisturizer over it thats no longer an issue. This product is not meant to serve as a stand alone moisturizer, this is a serum and needs to be applied before your moisturizer or cream.

content: Normally I use the COSRX hyaluronic moisturizer but it was out of stock and I needed a face cream so I decided to try this one. While i don’t find it moisturizing enough on its own, I love it as a final step to lock in all my other products and it makes my skin SO SMOOTH. I have rosacea and it gives me a lot of texture on my cheeks and forehead and this cream has massively helped it to subside. My makeup is going on smoother and my face is looking so hydrated. I wouldn’t recommend it for use on its own if you have dry skin but it would be great if you are a little more oily.

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Day & Night with Pro Vitamin B5 (D Panthenol) 50ml/1.69 fl.oz | Propolis Extract, Ceramide, Long Lasting Hydration for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Korean Skin Care

content: I have dry combination skin and was using rose hip oil for the longest time but still struggled with white heads around the cheekbones. I switch last summer to the COSRX water cream and it was perfect for the time of year. Once the weather changed and started to cool down I noticed my skin felt really tight so I purchased this cream and fell in love. Last week I felt like I experienced glass skin for the first time. My skin is soft, clear, and supple. It’s so good that I even notice a difference in my neck and back of the hands where I rub the excess. I have been whitehead and blemish free for several months now. I’m now considering the hyaluronic serum for my skin regimen and the snail mucin mask

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Day & Night with Pro Vitamin B5 (D Panthenol) 50ml/1.69 fl.oz | Propolis Extract, Ceramide, Long Lasting Hydration for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Korean Skin Care

content:
I love Coxrx skincare, and along with Beauty of Joseon, my skin is happy.

This is a lightweight moisturizer that does not irritate my rosacea-prone skin. It gives a nice glow -- not that "faux glow" from oil or something greasy looking/feeling but from healthy nourished hydrated skin.

I use this as my last step - unless I want a heavier moisturizer or an oil over it, on occasion when I want or need extra moisturizing.

I can compare this to BOJ Dynasty Cream but this Cosrx moisturizer doesn't have the sticky feeling that Dynasty cream has, so I prefer this one (even though I love BOJ, too).

I will reorder this over and over. But a little goes a long way so it'll last a long time.

content: Seal of approval from a sensitive/combo skin/suffering from winter dryness customer. I get terrible flakiness around my temples/brows/and nostrils this time of year . I had a customized product I was using as a moisturizer but it wasn't doing the trick (granted, I haven't updated my formula for this time of year...) BUT I wasn't fond of spending another 40+ on a custom product. Looked to Amazon for a decent option that might be thick enough at a lower price point. This doesn't disappoint. It's got a great buttery consistency but thick enough to do the job. I put some on last night before bed and this morning I saw no flakes , almost no sign of dryness actually. I did a clay mask this morning and followed it up again with this product and it's like I have completely different skin now. It's so dewy, hydrated, and plump. Love love love it. We shall see how it holds up throughout this winter but I'm hoping it continues to provide the hydration I need.

title: COSRX Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Day & Night with Pro Vitamin B5 (D Panthenol) 50ml/1.69 fl.oz | Propolis Extract, Ceramide, Long Lasting Hydration for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2024
content:
CosRx has prime products and flops for a mid value skincare brand, however this is product is my treasure. I have dehydrated and combination skin, so keeping up with my skin barrier and pairing exfoliants are a must. As such, I don't need a heavy oil-based moisturizer that leaves my face shiny and lacks hydration. Or a gel moisturizer that's too light and lacks moisture. These ingredients are exactly what my skin needs. In addition, this can work with active ingredients, so it's multi-purpose. This hydrating gel moisturizer is the perfect middle and has a light scent. I've seen someone people say it doesn't last and personally, this lasts me at least 2, max 3 months. A little goes a long way since it's thin but moisturizer. It's has a similar texture of La Roche Posay Hydrating Cleasner. In the end, while I change my skincare routine to try other products, this will always be in my rotation if my skin decides to act up. I understand why some may say it leaves them shiny and I don't discred them. Depending on my skin I'll use different amounts or products. However, for sleep, I always wake up with radiant and dewy skin. My face feels light, full, moisturized and breathable. Especially when you find the perfect ingredients to pair with this moisturizer.

P.S. I'm not sponsored. I'm just happy I found a moisturizer that works for my skin.

content:
I was looking for a lighter moisturizer to use in summer time for normal/dry skin. Cerave cream that I've been using felt a little too heavy and caused excessive sweating on the hot days.

This product has a lighter texture but turned out to be not much different from Cerave moisturizer. There really isn't anything special about it. No fragrance to speak of and packaging design is plain. You don't get that feel of luxury from using it. If you're looking for an inexpensive but effective moisturizer, then I recommend Cerave that costs much less for a bigger jar. I didn't find any advantage in using this more expensive product. content: Corsx really delivers on acne products, and this is no exception. I started using this daily during a heat wave to deal with maskne, and it really does the trick. It's moisturizing without being greasy, the anti-acne ingredients don't irritate my skin, and it's lightweight on my skin all day. It's a good value for money, too -- a little goes a very long way. And I've seen improvement in my skin, the best part! It works best coupled with the cleanser from the same line and an anti-acne serum, but my skin is less red, I've had fewer breakouts, and the deep cystic acne isn't as irritated. If you have dry skin, this probably won't be enough. But for normal to oily skin, it's fantastic.

title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2020
content:
COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 7

This light lotion is perfect with those with acne prone skin. Apply this after using the Cosrx AC Toner and press into the skin. This is so soothing. I have a small acne issue around my nose and this calmed everything down when used with the toner. The second ingredient is aloe vera which really impresses me. Most lotions start with water as the first ingredient. While this is a bit more expensive than drug store brands, there is nothing bad in the ingredients.

Madecassic Acid: calms and protects the skin
Asiatic Acid: balances and strengthens skin's barrier
Aloe Vera Leaves, Propolis Extract & Green Tea Extract: moisturize the skin and soothe irritation
Niacinamide & Zinc PCA: control excess oiliness

Ingredients
Propolis Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Water, Butylene Glycol, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Niacinamide, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cyclomethicone, Cetearyl Olivate, Betaine, Cetearyl Alcohol, Sorbitan Olivate, Panthenol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Allantoin, Xanthan Gum, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Hyaluronate, Arginine, Zinc PCA, Betaine Salicylate, Mentha Haplocalix Extract, Menthyl Lactate, Citric Acid, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid.

title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2020
content:
This is a very nice, not too expensive moisturizer by COSRX. It comes in their standard squeeze tube. Right now my skin takes a bit of a beating because I have to wear a face mask like we all do. The skin gets irritated from that and even though I am not prone to outbreaks and skin irritations right now I do have some of those. It is nice to have moisturizers like this one that can help with that.

This moisturizer has a nice pleasant scent. It is lightweight and absorbs quickly into my skin without leaving a heavy or greasy residue behind. It is a little tacky for a short period of time. Then my skin is nice and soft and if there is some irritation it does help with that. This is a nice little product that everyone should keep on hand especially right now.

title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free

content:
I'm fond of skincare products and am generally willing to try new products and brands. CosRx is among the well known South Korean brands known for their innovative products. This AC Collection has worked well for my breakouts. This moisturizer doesn't cause any redness, irritation or sensitivity. I have a hard time using moisturizers when I'm breaking out but this CosRX AC Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer doesn't cause any oiliness or further breakouts. Instead it helps calm down my skin while treating the pimples that occasionally sprout.

The constant use of face masks and my monthlies have caused a bad breakout and this moisturizer is helping me reduce the problem.

title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
content: One of the main ingredients in this COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer is aloe vera. I have been using aloe vera on my skin for years, and it is the best thing nourishing, soothing, and taming irritable skin. This lotion glides on smooth and soaks in quickly. It doesn’t leave any residue behind, yet leaves skin feeling hydrated and soft. My sensitive skin really likes this moisturizer.

title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2020
content:
COSRX is a Korean skin care line I recently discovered, and overall, some of the oroducts are decent, but sometimes overloaded with lots of chemicals.

I have older, combination acne prone skin, even in my 40's, and I am always on the look out for a moisturizing lotion that won't clog my pores, feel heave, or sting my sensitive skin.

I was pleased with this lotion - not sure it will replace my daily moisturizer once it's gone, but I did like the fact it was lightweight and didn't sting my skin. It didn't moisturize as much as I would like, and because my skin still felt a little tight even after application, I followed it with a thin layer of my regular moisturizer.

Overall, not bad, but not good enough for me to adopt as a regular product.

content: For a long time I have had oily skin that tight after cleansing. title: COSRX AC Collection Lightweight Soothing Moisturizer, 80ml / 2.70 fl.oz | Aloe Vera Leaves Extract 71.2% | Animal Testing Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
content:
To start, i have combination skin that is acne prone and very sensitive. It wavers back and forth from being super dry and super oily. Lately it’s been on the dryer side but I still have some excess oil upon waking up in the morning and towards the very end of the day. I get cystic acne time to time that takes forever to go away so it is very important to me to find a product that is non-comedogenic and will not clog my pores or lead to a lot of excess oil.

I gave this product a test run (been using it almost 2 and a half weeks now) because I was looking to see if I could find a better moisturizer than the one I have currently (the cereve lightweight nighttime moisturizer)

First for the positive notes: it went on smoothly, didn’t feel too thick or too lightweight, it had a pleasant smell, it didn’t feel tooo oily but it left a thin layer of residue that resembled oil. It felt relatively hydrating and I didn’t need to use a lot of it to get the job done. It also didn’t mess with my super sensitive skin like some other products will do.

And for the parts I was disappointed with: It left a small film over my skin after application that didn’t go away even with time. It didn’t play well with the retinol serum I like to use at night. Although moisturizing, it caused my face to be extremely oily upon waking up even if my skin was dry the previous night. Lastly, I believe this moisturizer is now causing me to break out. I have new acne patches that keep appearing.

I kept using the product hoping maybe it was a coincidence that I had more acne but the acne just kept coming.

I am sure this would be great for skin that isn’t acne prone, but sadly since I am, I can’t use this product.

I wish you luck in finding the best product for you!

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2024
content:
I do adore Cosrx skincare. It works very well with my type 1 rosacea-prone skin so I don't have redness or irritation or itchiness. Even their stronger formula vitamin c and niacinamide doesn't irritate my skin. Just a beautiful brand, and very reasonably priced.

This propolis cream is light but it's also very emollient and creamy. I compare it to their moisture power enriched cream and this full fit cream is a little more smother and creamier, though both are excellent.

This feels like silk going onto my skin. I look for the experience of my skincare as being important too, and this didn't disappoint. And, again, zero irritation.

This is just over 2 ounces - a little goes a long way so it should last a while. I ordered it on a Black Friday deal so I'm super happy about that savings, but even at full price it is a bargain.

Also, hours after I wrote this review, my skin is still glowing so it isn't that 'faux glow' you can initially have from skincare, but a lasting healthy beautiful glow - and on aging skin that says even more about this beautiful cream.

Adore!

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free

A jar of cream, into which we dip our fingers over and over again, cannot be as hygienic as a tube of cream.

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
content: I usually don't review skincare because they rarely work for my extremely sensitive acne prone skin. I use differin gel at night and I was looking for a moisturizer that won't dry my skin out. For 3 years, I had been using cera ve but for the past few months, I was getting cystic acne along my cheeks and jawline because of that. After lots of research, I concluded that I needed a very gentle moisturizer. So I bought this one. It is very very gentle. People who say this is heavy, I disagree with them because you just have to use a very very little amount on your face and it won't cause any heaviness. I use it twice a day and it has significantly improved dryness and flakiness on my skin. It won't resolve your acne problems. You have to look for an acne solution like april skin ipmp and differin for that. But otherwise, it's a great moisturizer!

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2024
content:
There’s a very fine line between hydrated and greasy skin, and unfortunately, this product is on the greasy side. That’s not to say it isn’t a good product, it just really isn’t for me. I have extremely dry skin, which struggles to take in moisture, so maybe it would work better for someone else!

It does feel very nice on the skin, stays rather cool even in normal indoor conditions (meaning I didn’t have it in the fridge) and has a light, pleasant smell! Overall, just not the right moisturizer for me!

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Light Cream, 2.19 Fl.oz / 65ml, Propolis 64.5%, Hydrating Daily Day and Night Moisturiser, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, Paraben Free

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Synergy Toner, 280ml / 9.46 fl.oz | Instant Moisture Boosting Toner, Propolis 72.6% Honey 10.7% Panthenol, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2020
content:
Really surprised how much I love this toner! Love the convenient flip cap packaging, no need for a twist cap. Solid plastic bottle with ink labeling (better than paper which eventually gets wrinkly when wet). About $20 for 10 fl oz is also a great deal.

The texture is lightweight and layerable. It soaks in so easily without ever feeling sticky or tacky on my normal/sensitive skin. I hate anything sticky and use this comfortably. There's a slight thickness and slip to it and yet no stickiness. Love that about it. It also leaves a nice subtle glow afterward. For me, sometimes I'll just use this toner after cleansing and call it a day, no additional moisturizer.

But the most unexpected benefit was when my hands were dry & peeling from over washing. I used this toner to hydrate my hands and it healed them much quicker than any hand cream or moisturizer!! Of course it also left them soft and supple. Just for that reason I would keep on repurchasing, as a multipurpose toner for my face and body.

Holy grail products have to be effective and packaged well. This checks both boxes for me.
(In comparison, the I'm From Rice Toner has a twist cap with paper labeling; the Pyunkang Yul Essence Toner has a flip cap but paper labeling and oddly left dry patches sometimes; etc.)

content:
届いた時から外装の袋がボロボロで（表側に約20㎝、裏側に3㎝の破けあり。郵便局に届いた時点でかなり破けてた。配達員さん全く悪く無いのに、とても謝ってくださった。）ちょっと不信感はありました。
届いてすぐ外装を撮ってから開封すると写真の通りです。
普通は上にあるお菓子のパッケージのような開け方から開けるんでしょうね。でも、見てください。開ける手間要らず。
顔に塗るものなので、ちょっと抵抗はあります。いや、かなり抵抗ありますよね。
届いて30分以内のレビュー&不安なのでまだ使っていませんが、現在の評価です。

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, and Uneven Skin, 9.46 fl.oz/ 280ml, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024
content: This is my second purchase of this toner but I bought this one off of amazon. It made me purge which isn’t what happened the last time I used it. But at the same time I started using this again after not using it for a couple months to that’s probably why. But be wary though, an exfoliating toner WILL make you purge the first couple of uses. It’s SOOO important to SLOWLY incorporate new skincare into your routine!! Don’t get carried away with using everything all at once like I did lol, especially with exfoliants because their job is to encourage skin cell turnover which could irritate your skin at first! But it’s been a month since i’ve bought this so I think it works nicely.

title: COSRX AHA/BHA Treatment Toner, Facial Exfoliating Spray for Whiteheads, Pores, and Uneven Skin, 9.46 fl.oz/ 280ml, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
content:
IT TAKES YOUR SKIN 30 DAYS TO GET USED TO ANY KIND OF SKIN PRODUCT

I've seen far too many reviews where people say something along the lines of "used for 2 weeks, made my skin worse." However, if you have done any research about chemical exfoliants you'd know it takes a while for your skin to get used to these types as products and this results in purge acne. The cool thing about purge acne is it is all pimples you were already going to get! That's right, chemical exfoliants speed up the process of clearing out those pores. After the purge acne has completed, you are left with soft, supple skin that will never ever have to see any kind of damaging face scrub again. Seriously though, physical exfoliants (face scrub) just damage the skin leading to more acne. If you love your friends, you'll tell them to quit using anything with chunks, sugar or dreaded microplastics in it and to get this stuff. End rant, on the the official review.

I love this stuff! I live in a high altitude and dry area and finding a toner that didn't make my face feel tight was everything. Along with acne prone skin made worse by dryness, this stuff has truly been a miracle for my skin. I use it twice a day and have had the smoothest, least irritated skin of my life. Highly recommend!

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2019
content: This is my first time purchasing this larger sized bottle, but I have been using this AHA/BHA formula for about 2 years on a daily basis. I am 45 so aging skin is a top concern and having an active toner to help with cell turnover is essential. I use this bottle as a refill for the spray bottle I already had. I use 2-3 pumps on my face & neck after cleansing to prepare for serums. There is little-to-no scent and no residue or film left after tapping in. Spraying it on is refreshing, though I'm sure applying it with a cotton pad would be just as effective. I love all the CosRx products I have tried and this is a constant in my daily skincare routine. I also ordered direct from the company and they included a full 3-step nose blackhead strip set which was awesome (I gave it to my daughter as she has a tendency for blackheads). I highly recommend this toner and CosRx :-)

I love love COSRX. It’s a relatively inexpensive brand, but works IMO and experience as well as high end.

This toner contains AHA and BHA so it really helps even out your complexion and remove dead skin. I have combo skin, occasional hormonal acne and aging (over 50). This is gentle enough not to aggravate my skin (it doesn’t burn or turn red) and isn’t greasy or heavy.

They apparently just changed their packaging so it’s over 9 ounces and got rid of the spray applicator. That’s almost double what it was before and the price did go up but not double (I think it was $14 before and is $20 now).

Customer for life as COSRX is amazing!

date: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2024
content:
After many years of listening to ads, people that don't know what they are talking about when it comes to skincare and wasting money on expensive products that smell good I decided to give this brand a try and never turned back. One thing people don't like is that you do not see instant results and have to use a few other products daily/nightly from now on and because of that ignorance they will continue to have aging and damaged skin while spending so much money on quick fix brands that look pretty. lol.

Anyway, I use this serum at night after the propolis toner and before the rest of my night night products from COSRX and I wake up with healthy, soft, plump, glowing skin every morning.
It is very easy to apply, especially cold, and it absorbs in seconds without making my moisturizer weird and stuff. lol

No scent or alcohol what so ever so its perfect for us guys that want the benefits without smelling like a flower all day.

Get it, it's worth every penny.

title: COSRX Propolis Ampoule, Glow Boosting Serum for Face with 73.5% Propolis Extract, 1.01fl.oz/30ml, Hydrating Essence for Sensitive Skin, Fine Lines, Uneven Skintone, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2024
content: This serum is incredible. I am a 68 yr old man. I apply it in the morning and again after washing my face at night. Each time, I then use my favorite lotion. I alternate weekly, one week - lotion with Collagen, one week lotion with Retinol and one week of a lotion with Hyaluronic Acid. I had always used the lotion routine, but I then found this and started putting this on prior to the lotions. I have been using it for about 3 months and I am incredibly impressed. People have complimented me on several occasions on my skin and asked what I have I been doing differently. It makes my skin feel fresh, smother and hydrated. It is great to use after sun because it revitalizes the skin and keeps it hydrated.

content: I saw so many great reviews for this product line, so seeing all the deals I decided to give it a try. I tried the snail face wash, serum, face cream and eye cream. I kept reapplying the lotions to see if it would help (winter in Wisconsin and all, ok maybe I needed a little more to get going). Wrong! By the end of the first day, my PD was flaring up, when it had been dormant for a bit. I was getting the red, burning dry spots to either side of my mouth and a red patch under my left eye. I stopped after a day and went back to coconut oil and olive oil. My skin is recovering, but sadly I am still searching for the right product for me. 0/10 stars, absolutely would not recommend!

date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2024
content:
I'm into my 3rd or 4th bottle of this eye cream, and I love it. Vitamin A derivatives are too harsh for the sensitive skin around my eyes, so I decided to try this product months back. From my research and feedback from friends, products from Korea are excellent. Their older women have beautiful skin... youthful and glowing.
Many products produced in America (or elsewhere) use younger women in advertising, so we're sometimes misled. This product is making a significant difference by minimizing my wrinkles/crows feet, dark circles and helping me maintain a more youthful look at 59.
I highly recommend this manufacturer and product. Most definitely worth a try. Have patience.

I do highly recommend washing the area first to improve the adhesion process. The smaller ones flip on the edges most often. But they still work. We usually wear them overnight, by morning the pimple is gone or at least greatly reduced. Definitely will be buying again.

title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2021
content:
Excellent product, and a definite repurchase. This is great for most acne, but works best on a pimple that hasn't come to a head yet.

The sticker 1) shrinks down the inflammation of the pimple, and 2) draws out impurities overnight. When you take the sticker off the next morning, usually there will be a little pinprick of pus. Then, after heating the area with a warm washcloth, you can gently squeeze the pus out without causing excessive trauma to the skin.

title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2021
content: I like Cosrx circle pimple patches but decided to try these and I have to say…these are so much better! I tried them for one day so far but I’m already impressed. These blend in better than the circle ones and it’s more adhesive. It doesn’t raise up like the circle version. I’ve been having a lot of white heads on my chin and they’re pretty deep into the skin. I had a big growing pimple on my chin and I put this on, 3 hours later…I took it out and it got most of the white stuff out. Amazing! I decided to place another one on top (I usually do this to the circle version too) and went to sleep. It stayed on the whole night and when I took it off in the morning, all the white gunk are out. Just ordered more even though I just got them yesterday. The prices are cheaper than the actual cosrx website. I wish these came in like a 10-pack. But overall, I love them!

title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
content: Listen. Pimple patches are A NECESSITY and no longer luxury in my life. If you ask me what I will take on a desert island, THESE definitely would come with me. Sometimes I get some nasty A** pustules before my cycle and they ofc wanna pop up on my face on the areas that you just can’t help but stare at. When one of those babies decide to come live on my face for a min (rent free at that) I go in like LIL WAYNE and pop them to get the excess BULL out and use one of these patches to cover the crime scene. They work best for me overnight (and during the daytime if you have somewhere to go). You will actually see the patch soak up allllll that juicy juice and you are left with a nice flat red dead redemption. Sometimes if you don’t get it all on one shot, just go in with another one until it is healed. I found that once’s it’s pretty flat I can let them heal on it’s own without the extra reinforcement and they flake off quicker. These give me so much satisfaction knowing that if someone is gonna stare at my face, I now have a HATA BLOCKA and they can’t wish for it to grow back cuz IT WONT. BOOYA 💥

content:

They dont sell these in stores around me and waiting for them through the cosrx website usually takes to long so using amazon works for me

title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2021
content: I haven’t written a review on Amazon in forever, but I had to write this one. My 11.5 son already has acne and has had it for a few years already. He unfortunately inherited his Dad’s super oily skin. I’ve got him on a good skincare regimen, but he’s still a kid and touches his face too much. We probably have 6-7 brands of acne patches. This one is the absolute best for pimples (but not deep under the skin zits). It reduces the size of the pimple, bringing it to a head and more importantly, the Centella extract on the patch reduces redness dramatically in just one application. Most non-microneedling patches don’t have this ingredient. It’s also very thin, stays on and is matte so that my son can wear it while he going to school remotely all day and it’s not noticeable in camera. And it’s the correct shape, the oval covers and adheres much better than the circle shape.

I've tried patches from Julep, Panoxyl, Peach Slices, Avarelle, Haruto, Hero, Rael, Welly, Breylee, Alba, Nexcare, Hanhoo, Fanof, The Creme Shop, Agrcare, Clearasil, Nspalife, Nanalua. Too many! title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2020
content:
I’m actually impressed with how well these work. When I’m stressed, my skin shows it. And of course, I can’t help but to pick at the biggest, ugliest pimples and turn them into mountains.

These patches adhere really well to the skin and don’t come off until it’s time. I’d be careful putting a patch over injured skin if you plan on prematurely removing it because chances are you’d rip open a wound, they stick that much. You’ll know when the patch is ready to come off because it’s loose at the center, appears “full”, and the edges give easily with some gentle pulling.

These patches are great because once I’ve got one on; I can’t pick at my skin anymore. They also really do work, and suck out whatever is in the pimple and after a day or so the patch falls off, in my case leaving a smooth but noticeable red mark that will eventually fade on its own. It really does help especially if you’re like me and can’t help but to pick. Please let me know if my review helped you by clicking the helpful button:)

title: COSRX AC Collection Acne Patch, 26 Patches with Centella Asiatica Extract, Blemishes and Zits Cover, Spot Stickers for Face and Body

Turns out they also suck all the gunk out (leaving white on the bandage) of the open pimple and SHRINK the skin. I left them on two zits I picked at overnight and woke up to nearly gone pimples with just healing skin. Love love will continue to just keep these on hand all the time. In the image you can see the skin plump from peel off but it clears up really fast :)

title: COSRX Niacinamide 5% + Snail Mucin 74% Dual Essence, Anti Aging Face Serum for Dull Skin, Hydrating, Repairing, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care, 2.70 fl.oz / 80ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024
content: I decided to review this product after 6 months of using it. I changed my face skin serum and moisturizer in Spring (around May). The plan was to switch to a lighter one for the summer season. My skin texture has changed a lot. I'm in the perimenopausal phase and just turned 50. I never have a skin problem apart from discoloration from being outdoorsy and a little lazy to use extra SPF. But, once Im getting older my pores are wider and I have lots of little bumps like whiteheads. That's never happened before. Plus fine lines on my forehead, crowfeet on the corner of my eyes, and neckline. Anyway, I ordered the serum and Snail Musin 92% face moisturizer and use it in the morning and I use the serum with my other retinol night cream (not COSRX) in the evening. After using this product for over 6 months I saw great results. Fine lines are reduced significantly, skin pores get smaller and the whiteheads disappear! My facial skin is glowing looks healthy and feels smooth. I'm ordering my 2nd bottle of the serum and will need to order the moisturizer probably next month. I just ordered a bundle of the serum with the Vitamin C serum. Normally I have to order facial serum and moisturizer between 3-4 months. But this product I use it for over 6 months. It's because they're so light and easy to absorb on the skin and have no scents or perfumes. For the price they're reasonable. I'm thinking of buying the facial wash soap but I love my Cetaphil Hydration face wash and toner and religiously use them because it didn't make my skin dry after washing. I hope this review helps ladies who are in the same phase as me and have similar skin conditions. Always order the product from their store, not another seller (normally selling at a cheaper price) because lots of fake products, read each product's characteristics so you can order the one that is right for your skin. Happy shopping! 🤗

title: COSRX Niacinamide 5% + Snail Mucin 74% Dual Essence, Anti Aging Face Serum for Dull Skin, Hydrating, Repairing, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care, 2.70 fl.oz / 80ml

title: COSRX Niacinamide 5% + Snail Mucin 74% Dual Essence, Anti Aging Face Serum for Dull Skin, Hydrating, Repairing, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care, 2.70 fl.oz / 80ml
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2024
content:
I loved this product for how it made my combination skin, but areas in my T-zone were clogged which is typical when I don't use 100% water-based or gel-based skincare products. Unfortunately, I don't know what exactly makes it so, but this was the case here.

I think it does help brighten dull skin, but in my case not so noticably that I would be eager to repurchase if I didn't have the pore issue (my skin isn't in great condition in general). However, if I had drier skin in general, I think this product would be a great fit!

I'm still giving it 4 stars since it has great ingredients and does the job, even if it didn't work for me. I would still recommend this to someone else, if it was targeted for their skin concerns or for maintenance with someone who has clear skin.

date: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2024
content:
Snail Goo for the Win! 🐌✨

Who knew snail slime could make your skin look this great?! I was very skeptical at first—after all, slathering snail goo on your face wasn’t exactly anything I’d ever heard of before. But COSRX Advanced Snail Radiance Dual Essence has seriously surprised me! (Really everything I’ve tried by this brand has!) This stuff in particular makes my skin SO hydrated and glowing and is super lightweight. I use it immediately after washing my face (day and night), before my face lotion.

The dual pump design is super fancy too—and it delivers the perfect amount of product every time so no waste. I’ve been using for about 3 months now and my skin has never been smoother! I’ve experienced less redness, and such a gorgeous glow that I didn’t know was possible as an extremely stressed 33 year old. If you’re up for a little slimy magic, give it a try. You absolutely won’t regret it!

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser, 5.07 Fl Oz / 150 mL, Rich Daily Deep Cleansing Gel for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2024
content:
Mid 50s with normal skin and trying to it keep hydrated, dewey and breakout free. Cosrx is hit or miss for me but I keep trying b/c my preferred brands (Yonka, Paula's Choice, L’Occitain) are comparatively expensive. After reading the 5 star reviews I decided to try this hoping to mitigate using PC cleanser and save some money. This was supposed to hydrate but it’s more like a hydration stripper on me. I have to rebalance the stripping effect by using the most nourishing moisturizers I own. After one use I’ve decided to return it before I start breaking out.

Pros
Great texture while using.

Cons
Smells strong, and similar to gain power wash for dishes
After rinsing skin felt stripped, dry and tight immediately
Tested on body and same reaction
With all the conflicting reviews it seems there may be a quality control issue

If you buy I hope you don’t join the ONE STAR club.

content: I have been consistently using this facewash since 2021 or 2022, I can't remember. Since then I truly haven't looked back. This facewash has never failed me and it never will. I love how thick it is and how it lathers. The way I wash my face is by opening up my pores with warm water- more on the hot side but not the type of hot that's uncomfortable on the skin- and then I'll put some of the cleanser on my fingers, rub my fingers together until it's like a paste (?) and then wash my face. I wash my face for about a minute, then rinse with cold water. I have had this cleanser on auto-replenish since trying it out for the first time. I love it so much and I can't get enough of it. 10/10 recommend.

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2024
content: I saw so many great reviews for this product line, so seeing all the deals I decided to give it a try. I tried the snail face wash, serum, face cream and eye cream. Only made it one day and I had to stop. None of these products actually moisturized my skin, but dried it out instantly. I kept reapplying the lotions to see if it would help (winter in Wisconsin and all, ok maybe I needed a little more to get going). Wrong! By the end of the first day, my PD was flaring up, when it had been dormant for a bit. I was getting the red, burning dry spots to either side of my mouth and a red patch under my left eye. I stopped after a day and went back to coconut oil and olive oil. My skin is recovering, but sadly I am still searching for the right product for me. 0/10 stars, absolutely would not recommend!

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser, 5.07 Fl Oz / 150 mL, Rich Daily Deep Cleansing Gel for Dry & Sensitive Skin, Korean Skin Care, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
content:
I'vr been using this in conjunction with the moisturizer. I have rosacea, and my skin is very sensitive, so I was very hesitant all the benefit claims. But this brand works so much better than my previous (much more expensive) facial cleanser products. It doesn't dry my skin; I can feel that after I wash my face, my skin feels refreshed instead of slowly tightening with dryness/irritation. Instead of needing to rush through patting my skin dry so I can quickly slap the moisturizer on, now I can take my time.

The cleanser is easy to use. The texture is like a gel cleanser, but it foams easily.
There's no scent at all. Like the moisturer, a little goes a long way, and that makes it very affordable.

My skin has been looking so much clearer, brighter, and glowy since I switched my skin care products. I'm so happy to have made the switch.

date: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2024
content:
I bought this when I ran out of another Korean made snail wash I've been using & loving for months. I didn't want to go to the store, saw this & thought, why not.

I don't know if this dried out my skin or if there is something in it I"m allergic to, though, there was nothing on the label I've had issues with before. All I know is, the first day I used this I started to itch. I didn't connect it right away. For the next three days I used it I itched worse & worse each day. Finally stopped using it & went back to what I'd been using before today & the itching is entirely gone already.

My son is going to try it. I'll update after he does. If he's fine, maybe there is something in it I'm allergic to. If he has problems it's going in the trash.

content:
I recently tried the fave mask and I have to say, it exceeded my expectations! From the moment I applied it, I could feel the nourishing ingredients working their magic.

**Texture and Application**: The texture is smooth and easy to spread, making application a breeze. It glides on effortlessly and has a pleasant scent that adds to the overall experience. I appreciate that it doesn’t feel heavy or greasy on the skin.

**Results**: After leaving it on for the recommended time, I rinsed it off and was amazed at how soft and hydrated my skin felt. It visibly brightened my complexion and gave me a nice, healthy glow. My skin felt refreshed and rejuvenated, which is exactly what I was hoping for!

**Ingredients**: I love that this mask is formulated with natural ingredients. Knowing that I’m treating my skin with quality components makes me feel good about using it regularly. Plus, it's free from harsh chemicals, which is a huge plus for sensitive skin like mine.

**Value for Money**: The price point is reasonable for the quality and results it delivers. A little goes a long way, so I can see this lasting me quite a while.

**Final Thoughts**: Overall, I highly recommend the [Face Mask Brand/Type] to anyone looking to pamper their skin. It’s become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can’t wait to try more products from this brand. If you're in need of a little self-care, this mask is definitely worth a try!

title: COSRX Snail Mucin Sheet Mask 10 EA with Snail Mucin Serum, Self Care, Face Masks for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2024
content:
The COSRX Snail Mucin Sheet Mask is one of the most hydrating masks I’ve ever used. My skin feels so soft and plump after each use, and it gives me that dewy glow I absolutely love. The snail mucin is great for boosting moisture and repairing skin, which makes this sheet mask perfect for anyone dealing with dry or dull skin.

However, I did find that there’s almost too much essence in each mask—so much that it tends to drip and get a bit messy. While I appreciate the extra hydration, it feels like a lot of it goes to waste, and the texture is definitely on the slimy side. I wish they could balance the amount of mucin better to avoid that overly sticky feeling.

Despite that, the results are worth it, and I usually pat in any extra essence on my neck and arms, so it’s not completely wasted. Overall, if you’re looking for an intensely moisturizing mask, this one will definitely do the trick—just be prepared for a little slime overload.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin Sheet Mask 10 EA with Snail Mucin Serum, Self Care, Face Masks for Dry, Sensitive Skin, Not Tested on Animals, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX Full Fit Propolis Honey Overnight Mask | 2.03 fl.oz / 60ml | Propolis Extract 87% | Korean Skin Care, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024
content:
As someone with dry, aging skin that tends to suffer even more during the harsh winter months, finding the right skincare product is crucial. I discovered the Cosrx Overnight Mask couple months ago, and I must say it has been a game-changer for me.

This overnight mask is a true gem for anyone with dry, aging skin, especially during the winter season. The texture is rich and luxurious, and upon application, it feels incredibly soothing and hydrating. The mask is absorbed quickly, leaving my skin feeling soft, plump, and deeply moisturized.

What I love most about this product is its effectiveness in combating dryness and restoring hydration to my skin. Waking up in the morning, I can visibly see and feel the difference - my skin looks more supple, radiant, and nourished.

The Cosrx Overnight Mask is gentle yet powerful, and I appreciate that it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. The formulation is packed with beneficial ingredients that work together to replenish moisture and improve skin texture over time.

I highly recommend the Cosrx Overnight Mask to anyone with dry, aging skin, especially during the winter months. It has become an essential part of my skincare routine, and I can't imagine going through the season without it. Give it a try - your skin will thank you!

title: COSRX All About Snail Mucin Korean Skin Care Set, Mini Travel Essentials, Travel Size Gift Set with Snail Mucin Face Wash, Serum, Moisturizer & Eye Cream, Rejuvenating Kit
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2024
content:
This set of snail skincare, with 1) gel cleanser, 2) serum/essence, 3) eye cream, and 4) face cream, is an amazing and inexpensive way to try a lot of the CosRx snail mucin line. Every product in this kit is fantastic on its own, and is definitely worth the money.

1) cleanser: it's not too stripping or drying, yet makes your face feel quite clean. Fun gel texture that lathers up pretty well, and a fun little citrus-y clean scent that isn't too overpowering, either.
2) essence: very thicc, seems gooey and sticky, but is seriously moisturizing. It does not irritate my normal/dry skin, and I use it at least once a day, if not twice.
3) eye cream: smooth, creamy, sinks in really well and hydrates deeply. I can't say it de-wrinkles my designer eye bags or makes them less noticeable, but it definitely helps moisturize and prepare the skin for color correcting and concealer.
4) face cream: the best ever. just do it.

I myself have previously purchased full sizes of the essence, the eye cream, and the face cream, and I am considering getting the cleanser when my current one runs out.

anyways, this is worth it, just to try the products, although I guess you run the risk of falling in love with all the products.

content: The Cosrx All About Snail Kit is a game-changer! It’s the perfect introduction to Korean skincare and an absolute must-have for achieving that coveted glass skin look. title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
content: I have good skin and at 53 have very few wrinkles -good genes, I’ve been fairly neglectful of my skin my whole life. Now that I’m going through “the change” I’ve noticed my skin is a tad dry. This was recommended by a friend so I decided to give it a whirl. First of all, I’m a nurse and I need an easy routine or I just flat out won’t do it. This is very simple. Secondly, my husband is allergic to perfume so I am very careful about making sure products I use are unscented and this has no real discernible scent. Thirdly it’s quite inexpensive (I bought the full size products and paid less than what I’ve paid for a single face cream) and Fourth… it works!! I’ve always been complimented on my skin, but wow. I noticed a huge difference in my skins texture and suppleness. My face feels well moisturized without being oily. Love this system!!

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
content:
i've never really used much on my face besides drugstore brand moisturizers and sunscreens, but was reading up on the "glass skin" trend and was like "why not? this has the toner, ampoule, and cream that these websites say i need". i liked that it was a little all-in-one packet for a cheap price, so i could test out whether i'm responsible enough for a facial regimen without committing much.
my face is so freaking soft now! i put it on at night after washing, and in the morning my face still feels like fresh baby booty. and i'm 38 and a sun-worn raisin, so the effects are more immediate and dramatic than i would have expected. i'll be continuing to use this brand.

my only complaints are that the toner bottle doesn't have easy-use opening (you shake it/slap it on your skin to get a drop out?) and there aren't any instructions so i'm not quite sure if its best to use them in the morning, at night, in what order, how much, whether there's specific areas i'm supposed to target for each liquid, etc? i don't know what i'm doing.

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
content: I'm mid thirties... some areas are dry, some not. This stuff is awesome. Great combo pack for travel or to try out the line. I've since bought the full size of all three products. Use them at night on a fresh clean face and in the morning, I'm telling you even in just one night, much more moisturized, irritation is down, smoother cheeks, the dewy effect makes fine lines less noticeable. Its a win for me. For the cost, just try it out. Its enough product for you to see if its going to work for you without a huge money commitment.

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
content: This was my first time introducing Propolis into my skincare regimen. While I cannot compare these Propolis products to prior experience, I did feel as though all three products are quite hydrating. My favourite is the Ampoule, which I will be buying in full size to add to my regimen. The texture is a bit sticky for all three products, but that is to be expected because of the nature of the ingredients. The toner is least sticky though and leaves my skin nicely hydrated and ready for the rest of my routine.

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
content: Bought it for my girlfriend and he has made sure to let me know everyday how much she loves it, and how good it is at hydrating her face.

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2021
content: The toner is slightly thicker than water and very hydrating to the skin. The ampoule is very thick and you only need a few drops for the whole face. Seriously, no more than 3. The light cream is my favorite cosrx moisturizer right now. I have balanced to oily skin and it’s just enough to provide what i need for the whole day without getting greasy. If you have dry skin, this may not be enough. I ended up purchasing the full size versions and keeping these for travel (when that’s possible again).

title: COSRX Honey Glow Kit, Korean Skin Care Set with Propolis Facial Toner, Serum, & Cream, Mini Travel Essentials, Deep Moisture, Hydration, Nourishment, Travel Size Gift Set, Korean Skin Care

content: I love the ampule and moisturizer, super sensitive and hydrating! I didn't care for the toner, but that is personal preference. The sample is a great size to test these products, I just ordered a large cream! Would recommend for dermatitis or rashes on skin. I would like if it had a scent though.

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2022
content:
It's certainly richer than most hand creams but it is pretty far from intensive.
My hands crack during the winter and usually use Neutrogena but wanted the ceramides against aging. It's not nearly as rich as the Neutrogena, I have to use it after every hand wash so the lasting effects are also lacking.
It's a good hand cream but ain't a miracle.

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2021
content: Like so many other K-beauty brands, COSRX prides itself in not using “artificial fragrances” in their products. Well, I wish they WOULD switch to artificial fragrance because I’m sick and tired of breaking out and having allergy flare ups to these “clean” products that contain Bergamot or other citrus oils (just for the scent, if we’re being honest). Just because a fragrance is “natural”, doesn’t mean it doesn’t cause issues. I get a rash that lasts for days when I use products with citrus oils and this cream is just another one on the list. Why are the ingredients not listed here? Anyway, the cream is great for dry skin, no doubt. But use caution if you have even a slight sensitivity to citrus.

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2021
content:
I have very dry hands in the colder months. I’m always trying to find a cream to replenish the moisture. I hate when my hands and I usually have eczema patches on my hands this time of year but not any longer!
This cream is fantastic and has cured the dryness!!! Thanks so much!!! I need to buy this for my family members!

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2022
content: I've liked a few other skin care items from this brand, and this hand cream works wonders. My hands become berry dry with rough patches near my knuckles in the winter, and after a week or so of consistent use, this stuff has made my hands soft and hydrated. It recommends to use after washing hands and I did notice that is when it works the best. Based on my personal results so far, I would purchase this product again

title: COSRX Ceramide Therapeutic Hand Cream Intense for Dry Cracked Hands 1.7 oz/50 mL, Made with Shea Butter & Ceramide, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2022
content:
I get atopic dermatitis sometimes, have been since childhood, so this is decades of trial and error. It tends to get worse (dry, cracked, painful skin) in winter and these days mostly on hands. This cream is not a miracle cure-all overnight treatment by all means. However, it gets skin from nicely moisturized, prevents new inflammation areas, and so far has been slowly getting my skin to heal back to normal. All that in the middle of the winter in freezing outdoors and super-dry indoors.

It’s not for everyone obviously. Even though it barely smells to me for the entirety of a minute (which is good: couldn’t get myself to use the last cerave I got in the pharmacy), it still got citrus (limonene and bergamot oil) in ingredients. So I’d probably not use it in summer with direct sunlight.

But so far this is one of the better non-prescription products I’ve used, moisturizing and healing.

date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
content:
I have always used Cosrx with a lot of enthusiasm because their products are good, not expensive and they give you results.
Not these patches.
First, they have a shape that is obnoxious. They are too big and they slip down the cheeks. At first I thought I had a faulty item because they are not cut as usually eye patches are, that from a circle you can get two.
Not here. From a circle you have one eye patch and a tiny leftover piece that I don’t know what to do with it, as it is too small.
Also, they just don’t work in any way on puffiness, tiredness, glow, etc they just give you a nice sensation of freshness but that doesn’t turn into a result.
They might be good for a 20 years old that is already perfect and don’t really need them.
Too bad. ☹️

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch (60pc), Gel Serum Mask, Puffy Undereye Treament, Fine Lines, Refresh, Hydrate| Paraben free, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2024
content: I love anything snail mucin but the eye patches are soooo good. They have my under eyes so moisturized. I love how the under eye patch covers such a large area & the little extra pieces it comes with I put on my smile lines. Once I take them off I rub all the snail mucin goodness into my skin & carry on with my regular skin care like normal. They are super slimey & slippery so they can slide around if you are not stationary while having them on but you can easily just slide them back into place. I am not sure if I have noticed a huge difference in my skin yet (in some cases skin care can take time to see a noticeable difference if using consistently) bc I have only been using them for about a month & I have not been consistent with putting them on everyday but my skin feels supple right afterwards. I am also using other snail mucin products in conjunction with this & I have noticed my skin has been pretty clear but that could be my other skin care products as well. All in all great product & worth the $ in my opinion. I will def continue to purchase once I run out

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch (60pc), Gel Serum Mask, Puffy Undereye Treament, Fine Lines, Refresh, Hydrate| Paraben free, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2024
content: The COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch is a decent option for addressing under-eye concerns, offering hydration and soothing benefits, but it falls short of being a game-changer due to its tendency to slip away during application. While the hydrogel patches adhere initially, they often struggle to stay in place until they fully dry, which can be frustrating. Despite this drawback, I've found that the patches provide a cooling sensation and deliver a boost of moisture to the delicate under-eye area. The snail mucin content offers some additional nourishment, leaving the skin feeling soft and refreshed. However, the slipping issue detracts from the overall experience and limits the effectiveness of the product. Overall, while the COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch has its merits, its inability to stay in place until dry prevents it from reaching its full potential as a standout eye care product.

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Hydrogel Eye Patch (60pc), Gel Serum Mask, Puffy Undereye Treament, Fine Lines, Refresh, Hydrate| Paraben free, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2024
content:
I have these on subscribe and save and have had them delivered 3 times now. I have genetic dark circles under my eyes, and I don't actually mind them as they're pretty mild.
However, when I'm tired, they are very prominent.
Between my age (37), 2 young kids, working full time at a demanding job, as well as gut renovating an early 1900s home.... It's safe to say I'm tired. A lot.
These are part of my morning routine - brush teeth, wash face, tone, eye gels while I do other morning stuff. Then I take these off and moisturize with my regular skincare and I can do makeup and whatever else.
These are slimy, but I just run them against the rim of the jar as I take them out and it gets the excess slime off. There's still plenty of goo, but they don't slide so much.
They're super hydrating, help massively with puffiness and mitigate my dark circles some. They're very soothing.
My under eye area is wildly sensitive. I get rashes and/or sensitivity from most under eye creams etc. I find these don't bother them at all. They feel so good and calming, and work so well.
I'd recommend for sure.

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
content: I have sensitive skin, and it gets irritated easily. My face didn't care for this cleansing balm. There's fragrance added to it (don't understand why companies do this) which is really unfortunate. My skin doesn't react well to added fragrances in skin care. The balm itself has a good consistency, nothing that separates it from others, aside from the fragrance. It melts into the skin fine enough, but I didn't find it to do much. I had to follow up with another balm before my cleanser to remove my makeup (not even waterproof). This is a "pass".

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
content: I was very sad that this cleansing balm didn't work for my skin, because I really like CosRx as a brand. Because of their reputation and how their other products generally work well for sensitive skin, I ordered this without first reading the ingredients list. This was a mistake. I'm really surprised at how many comedogenic and irritating ingredients there are in this. The coconut oil in it broke me out, and the essential oils (lavender and eucalypus) irritated my skin. Lavender oil is very high up in the ingredients list (5th), much higher than any of the soothing ingredients the brand markets this with, which appear in very small quantities literally at the very end of the INCI. This cleansing balm does spread nicely and emulsifies well, but this is a miss from CosRx for me.

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
content: I love a good balm cleanser, but I prefer those with a waxy consistency that emulsify when splashed water to the type that immediately liquifies when it hits the skin. This definitely falls into the latter category. The experience is much more akin to using an oil cleanser and, like many oil cleansers, it leaves behind a faint greasy residue on my skin. In terms of ingredients, not surprisingly this contains a rogues gallery of botanical oils, including coconut, lavender, sunflower, eucalyptus leaf, olive, sweet almond and jojoba, as well as shea butter. While it has no artificial fragrance, there's strong tea tree-like smell which I chalk up to the eucalyptus oil. This is okay and works fine in conjunction with a foaming second cleanse, but hardly a favorite.

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2022
content: Some reviewers here seem to not know what a cleansing balm is. It is a greasy, cream-like cleanser that melts into your face and lathers when water is added. I like how it works and how it feels on my sensitive skin. It's a good alternative to my favorite cleansing oil. The balm comes with a small spatula. What I don't like is the smell. Kind of surprised COSRX people haven't figured out how to make this product smell nice.

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2022
content:
This does not work for me. The cleanser is a waxy cream that just melts on your skin. While it does feel nice, it totally clogs my pores and I have whiteheads all over. Not fun at all. The scent of this is horrible too!
I do understand that this might work for some, but it's just not good on my skin. B

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2021
content: So I got this because I have sensitive skin and I could not find a great deal on BanilaCo Cleansing balm and I was hoping to find an alternative. This works but is underwhelming. It does have a slight eucalyptus smell but now strong. It is almost a medicinal eucalyptus scent but not terrible or overpowering. It did not react on my skin which is always great to find a product that doesn’t cause hives and rashes. I have an allergic reaction to Cetaphil if that puts it into perspective. While it does remove make up perfectly I didn’t absolutely love the feeling after I rinsed my face. It felt like there was still product on my face from the cleanser. Almost like a film. I am most certainly going to finish the container and if nothing else is available I would definitely re-purchase this but I didn’t love the feeling after I rinsed my face. BanilaCo rinses so well and doesn’t feel like product was left behind. It does melt beautifully on your skin, but that can be a problem with ordering during the summer. Since it would easily melt in the warm weather in transit. Overall a decent product!

title: COSRX Pure Fit Cica Smoothing Cleansing Balm, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml | Deep Hydrating Meltaway Cleanse for Sensitive Skin

title: COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml, Mildly Exfoliating PHA For Sensitive Skin with Natural Cellulose, Radiating, Cleansing, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
content:
I have old, thin, and sensitive skin, so I’ve avoided exfoliation for years. I’m also allergic to anything with fragrance. I’ve used COSRX and am pleasantly surprised at how it leaves me in control. Applied on wet skin, this light cream almost “pills”, leaving soft little nubs that I rub gently on areas of my face with dark spots and larger pores.

Out of a sense of caution regarding my thin skin, I’m only exfoliating once a week. My skin has not become irritated, which is a major victory! I’ll see how my skin improves over time.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml, Mildly Exfoliating PHA For Sensitive Skin with Natural Cellulose, Radiating, Cleansing, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
content:
I recently purchased the COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel facial cleaner and I have to say that I am extremely impressed with its performance. After using it for a few weeks, my skin feels fresh and clean every morning.

One of the things I love about this facial cleaner is how gentle it is on my skin. Despite being a scrub, it doesn't irritate or dry out my skin like some other exfoliating products do. Instead, it leaves my skin feeling smooth and hydrated.

The peeling gel works by breaking down dead skin cells and unclogging pores, leaving my skin looking brighter and more radiant. It has a lightweight, gel-like consistency that spreads easily and works well with my skin type.

I also appreciate that the COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel is free from harsh chemicals and is suitable for all skin types. It's a great alternative to more abrasive scrubs that can be harsh on sensitive skin.

Overall, I am extremely happy with the COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to improve the appearance of their skin. It's an awesome product that leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml, Mildly Exfoliating PHA For Sensitive Skin with Natural Cellulose, Radiating, Cleansing, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2022
content:
I really wasn't sure what to expect from this product, but have come to really love and trust COSRX products and wanted to give it a try.
It has a *very* light, clean scent (if you smell the opening of the bottle), however, there is really no scent at all that I notice while using.
Again, not knowing what to expect, it felt weird the first time, because the cellulose feels like rubbing little wet pieces of paper around on your face, lol. Which I guess makes sense since cellulose and paper are both made from tree pulp.
This has a different sort of feel to it, as it isn't particularly "slippery" and kind of feels like you're just rubbing the little pieces of wet paper around on your face, as though there is no actual product, so it was tempting to keep adding more product. But don't do that, lol. It really is working, even if it feels like there's nothing there.
Although I have been careful to avoid the eye area, this seems quite gentle and I haven't experienced any type of burning or irritation at all.
The first time I used it, I did get a little on my lips by accident, but all it did was remove the dry, peeling skin, leaving them very soft& smooth. (Wouldn't recommend using this for that reason on purpose, as some people may have more sensitive lips/skin than I.)
At night, I pre-cleanse with COSRX LowPh Good Morning (tea tree oil) Cleanser, and then use this Low Ph Good Night Gel Cleanser. Since starting this, it has left my skin with a lovely glow, feeling very clean & refreshed.
On a side note, the first couple of times I used this product, I noticed that several of those teeny, tiny, hard round bumps under the surface of my skin, several that I didn't even know where there, (you know, those tiny, hard "pearl"-like round bumps; the kind that are impossible to squeeze or remove without tearing up your skin) were RIGHT at the surface, almost all the way out by themselves, and easily came the rest of the way out, causing NO damage to my skin at all. It was very satisfying, lol.
I guess the product gently removed the dead layers that were keeping them trapped.
I've only been using this for perhaps a week or so, but it does seem that the pores on my nose and cheeks are just a bit smaller. They're certainly cleaner!
Before using this peel gel, I had suddenly begun breaking out far more (and worse) than usual, and since using this, I've had no new breakouts at all and it has helped to rapidly get rid of existing blemishes.
I REALLY love this stuff and will definitely continue to purchase and use this product!
Hope this helps a little if you're on the fence.
Highly recommend giving this a try!

title: COSRX Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel, 4.05 fl oz / 120ml, Mildly Exfoliating PHA For Sensitive Skin with Natural Cellulose, Radiating, Cleansing, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
content: I love this product. I can't get BHA (salicylic acid) or propylene glycols near my face because they cause contact dermatitis even at low concentrations. So many exfoliating peels, washes and treatments contain BHAs which are not compatible for everyone. This gel is gentle yet effective at removing the dead skin left behind from my regular use of tretinoin. It says night use on the product but I use it in the shower in the morning and it gives my skin a smooth finish for lotion and sunscreen application for the day so that I don't look like a peeling mess of dead skin. Please keep stocking this product COSRX!

It's definitely NOT better than Laneige though, which I prefer because it's thicker and lasts way longer. I dislike how this feels on the lips, it's slippery but also somehow grainy. I also dislike the scent/taste of this, it's a faintly reminicent of cheese or evaporated milk?

I wanted to like this but I think I'll stick with my Laneige or maybe use it over a tinted (and scented!) lip balm occasionally.

content:
I've been using the Laneige lip sleeping mask for the past 2 years but was ready to try CosRx version of a lip mask. I have purchased many CosRx products in the past and loved them all so I had high expectations.
I should have researched the ingredients (listed below) first before purchasing. I don't particularly care for both Shea butter and coconut oil which are both in this product.
It feels a lot like coconut oil but also is not very hydrating for me. When I first opened it there was a small pool of liquid oil in the center of the product that didn't look too appealing. However, with some of the natural ingredients that is going to happen and didn't really bother me.
There is no fragrance which is a big plus and no artificial color.
I also found that I have to use more product than with Laneige so the little container likely is not going to last as long.
I'll use this up but won't repurchase.

title: COSRX Lip Care Balm for Dry Chapped Lips, Enriched with Shea Butter, Sleeping Mask, Korean Skin Care, Animal Testing-Free, Artificial Fragrance-Free, Parabens-Free (Lip Butter)
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
content:
As soon as I saw this, I knew I had to order it because I was running low on my pot of a similar lip mask by a certain higher end skincare brand, I've had good luck with K-beauty (especially Cosrx), and it's cheaper than my previous product.
The consistency of this lip mask is much harder and oilier than it looks in the pictures. You really have to dig your finger in there in order to get out enough to cover your lips. It applies smoothly, albeit a bit thin and sticky (if you use too much, it feels strange on the lips rather than feeling like a thick mask). It also tastes like literally nothing. Like. Nothing. I've been trying to figure out a taste/scent of this product ever since I got it and it's nothing. Which is fine if you're sensitive to scents, but I'm not and I like my lip products to have a little bit of flavor.
When I wake up after using this mask overnight, my lips feel smoother but not necessarily hydrated. It's like it gives the surface some help but doesn't soak all the way through. My dry skin feels softer but it's not gone.
Overall, I probably would not order this lip mask again and would splurge the extra $5 to get my name brand alternative, but this is a fair dupe that works fine.

I love these things - pimple patches in general are a godsend for me. Not particularly for actually getting rid of the pimple - I have a lot of deep acne that doesn't lend itself really well to being suctioned out -but because I'm a picker and these things stop me from making everything 10 times worse!

Of all of the pimple patches I've tried, these are decent enough as far as actually getting the gunk out, but I love them because they are just so large and cover such a large area.

I will say, these work best over LONG periods of time, more than just a night. You're supposed to take them off once the edges kind of start to loosen on their own, which takes a decent chunk of time. I usually wear these on my weekends for a night and the next day, and sometimes even another night when I have no plans outside of the house - these are nowhere near as discreet as the smaller ones because they are just so big so I always feel a little self-conscious wearing them out for anything more involved than walking in and picking up a mobile order somewhere.
