title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2022
content:
Long but here’s my truth!
Since discovering hydrocolloid acne patches, I’ve been obsessively buying multiple brands and testing them to see which works best. As you can see from my photos and line of work, I’m prone to deep and superficial acne and “maskne” as well as hyperpigmentation. I’ve tried hanhoo and alba patches (available at Walmart) as well as a few others and this one by far worked the best.
I applied these patches before going to work and took them off once I got home (12hrs). After applying, I couldn’t even see where the borders were, but within a few hours, the pus and oil these drew out was shocking, and by the time I made it home I couldn’t believe it.
I had already previously treated several of these spots already with the patches from the other brands- they were already flat and non-sensitive. In my mind, “healed” minus some residual discoloration. Especially because no new drainage was collecting on the other patches.
Then I use this one and Boom! I was SHOCKED to see the amount these patches drew from my “healed” areas. Even areas where I “didn’t have acne” because my skin looked perfect on the outside.
These patches are huge so they’re great if you have focal/concentrated acne areas. As well as hitting areas you didn’t even know about that would soon be a problem. The other brands patches are just small, different sized circles- to get the same results you would have to apply like you’re a pixelated character. Trust and believe- I have😅😂
The middle patch was on my chin, the others on both cheeks. Forgot to snap what all three looked like before removal because I was too excited to see the results.
I even put moisturizer on my face around the patches after applying because I’m prone to dry skin- this didn’t affect them at all. Didn’t budge through me sweating during my 12 hour shift caring for patients. No lifting at the edges at all.
I even removed and reapplied the chin patch 3 times before leaving its placement- I need to be able to talk and really wanted to experiment with how it did after losing “initial adhesive” and being in a very mobile area of my face, so I pity placed it on my chin as a test. I didn’t even think any would come on that patch at all because of how “treated, flat, and un-inflamed” it was.. You can see the results in my photo. Stayed out all night. 10/10. Will be buying more and highly recommend!

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
content:
Be patient and follow the instructions.

Always cleanse your face first because that’s when it works the best.

I had a painful pimple near a birthmark come up on Saturday morning, and I had just watched Khloe Kardashian speak about how she thought she had a pimple but it was actually melanoma so I was spiraling about this. So I decided to just make sure it wasn’t a pimple and put a patch over it since my dermatology office is closed on the weekend anyway. I washed my face with my shiseido cleanser, air dried my face and then applied a patch to my cheek. I left it on from around 7 PM Saturday evening until about 10 AM on Sunday morning and it extracted so much gunk. Now, it’s Monday and the surface is flat and it doesn’t hurt. It’s completely purged and the redness is starting to subside.

CosRx products just work everytime I use them. You just have to be patient and remember that there are no 5 minute cures. Skin takes time to purge, the heal and to show off the benefits. I highly recommend these. I always keep them on hand. Especially with my PCOS causing random pimples.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2021
content:
I had the worst breakout of my life a couple of months ago and these dried them up within 2 days of the arrival of the monstrosities. I love how the size can tackle several at once. What I had left over I use over my nose piercing since it recently decided it doesn't like stainless steel or rose gold and tried to cause a ruckus. Cleaned the piercing, lay this flush with it, within 3 days the ungodly inflammation and leakage is almost gone and it's obviously healing this time.

I can't recommend these enough. Only thing is just make sure you clean around where you're going to use them with alcohol and don't apply any lotion around the area before or after applying them. The oils loosen it and it'll fall off. That's user error. Not a flaw in the product. Use it like you're supposed to and it'll work the way it's supposed to.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)

content: Although these patches cover more areas of the skin, I noticed that the white sebum is only sucked out from these patches when my pimples are mature. Meaning, if you just got a pimple coming out and it is so fresh and new, this patch may do nothing for you. No white sebum ckming out from just risen small pimples.. But if you have a mature pimple, that is fairly large, then the white sebum is suckered out. Been trying to focus on a few small pimples on my chin but this product does not work as well for me compared to the spot on patches that are more concentrated.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021
content: Will continue to buy until I die. These are great for widespread breakouts. I’m a black guy, and I’ll occasionally break out on my left cheek after shaving. These save me from ingrown hairs and Post shave irritation. The adhesive on these is WAY better than other brands. They even stay on over my thick night moisturizer. They’ve made a lifetime customer out of me on these. Wish they came in a larger pack.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2021
content:
With a retail cost of sixteen bucks for 10 patches, these are quiet pricey even for the large size. With the current sale and if you order them via subscribe and save you can get it down to ten bucks which is much more reasonable, but still a bit pricey.

I've found that these large patches work best on fully open acne spot rather than just slightly punctured ones. I had a section of large cystic acne on the back of my neck that I'd been battling for a month. When I finally just decided to dig into them and hope for the best I tried one of these after a few days of them not healing well. It seemed to work great. I left it on for 24 hours and it seems to absorb all or at least most of the gunk from all the really raw open ones.

On the other hand when I used it on a cluster of small punctured acne spots under my face mask, it didn't seem to do nearly as well.

This stuck really well for over 24 hours. So well in fact that I lost a few hairs from the back of my neck as well. It did help form a nice healing cover over the old acne as well.

These are expensive, and seem to work best on raw open acne, but I did like them and would consider purchasing them in the future, especially since I likely wouldn't have to use them often. I think If I needed this size often, I'd be more inclined to find something more cost effective.

content: COSRX Master Patch X-Large Patches. Great for treating large dense acne areas! These patches are effective for my teen! She is using to treat areas with pimple flares, like her chin, check, forehead. These hydrocolloid pimple patches cover a large area than the typical pimple circle patches. They are translucent, thin, soft, flexible, comfortable to wear and effective! They bubble up, extract gunk from pimples, plump up the skin underneath, and close up open areas. They effectively help heal pimple areas with reduced scaring. They stick on well and stay on. B/c they are large, my teen wears them only at home and takes them off when out. They are easy and gentle on the skin, and can be removed without pain. 10 patches are included. The patches come in an resealable pouch to help keep the patches from drying out.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2021
content:
COSRX Master Patch X-Large 10 Patches

These are essentially hydrocolloid pimple patches but larger, so that you can treat an area of concern or a group of blemishes with a single patch. They're contoured for a better fit. They're almost invisible on the skin and help to clear up blemishes while also keeping you from picking at them, which could lead to scarring. Good to have on hand if you are prone to blemishes, particularly if they tend to pop up in clusters.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)

content: Pimple patches are always stocked in my skincare draw. I never let it run out. I use it so frequently when I feel like a pimple is coming I slap one on and the inflammation subsides overnight. They definitely help reduce healing time for popped pimples too. I love this larger patch because I get it around my nose a lot and this fits over the area perfectly. Now if they only make one for the entire face Lol

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
content: This daytime version of the patches stay on my face much better than the regular version of the patches. They stay on my face so well that I forget that I'm wearing a patch. One day, I washed my face with these patches on and they still stayed in place. That is how strong these patches are compared to the normal patches. But when it comes to the whitehead absorption part, the patches are so-so. Sometimes, they work and other times they don't work great. The effects of this pimple patch is just as good as the normal ones. The size/severness of the pimple gets reduced A LOT after a whole day (or night) of wearing it, especially if the white stuff is showing already. One night of use typically isn't enough. After a few days the pimples I've used these on are flat, less red and less likely to scar. I make sure to create a small hole in the actual acne before placing one on. Ideally washing your face with warm water beforehand.

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2021
content: These patches are amazing! I’ve tested these for almost a week & they really work. I had a pimple under my eye & a cluster on my forehead. After applying, i left them there for 24 hours & they virtually vanished and/or appeared smaller. I was afraid of acne scars but these patches definitely don’t cause them. Highly recommend!

9/15/2021

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)

content:
COSRX is by far favorite brand of hydrocolloid acne patches. I highly recommend these!! Hope this helps. 😉

title: COSRX Master Patch Intensive | Oval-Shaped Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch with Tea Tree Oil & Salicylic Acid | Quick & Easy Blemish, Zit, Spot Treatment (10 Patches (X-Large), 10, Count)
date: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2023
content: This worked really well on my chin breakouts; I am a fan of hydrocolloid patches but the regular ones are too small for my chin breakouts where there are often 2 clustered near each other or larger cysts. Like many of the reviewers I also struggled with maskne, particularly during long shifts (healthcare) and this helped clear them up overnight while I slept. While they weren’t completely gone, in the AM the swelling, pain/tenderness and discoloration were massively reduced. The one downside is that they can dry my skin out, and particularly when combined with retinoid or salicylic acid treatment; if not placed flush with the skin it could cause an odd temporary crease in the skin, but this went away quickly. All in all, i stick to the regular patches most nights, but when theres an extra heinous breakout these work like a charm

content: I test out a lot of acne patches and have used numerous different patches varying in sizes, shapes, thin/thickness, and even price. title: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
content:
Ugh. I should have looked more closely, but in case you didn’t—this is made with standard American chemical sunscreen ingredients like Octocrylene, Avobenzone, etc. Not the active ingredients that are usually in Korean brands (which aren’t FDA approved so you don’t find them in American chemical sunscreen, yet they are safer and healthier active ingredients).

I was gonna just not worry about it since it’s only one bottle—even if I’m concerned about the toxicity of those ingredients, one bottle won’t hurt. Except I cannot STAND the fragrance. It really sticks around on your face. It was so off-putting to me that it actually made me lose my appetite. Grandma-ish and just yucky. Had to wash it off.

I think I’ll have to just throw it away. Such a disappointment.

title: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024
content: I want to preface this review by stating that I have combination skin and have used my fair share of Asian sunscreens (skin1004, beauty of joseon, nivea, biore, roundlab, etc.). A common theme among all of them is their lightweight feel. Better put: they dont feel like susncreens, they just feel like nice lightweight moisturizers, which is what I love about them. This feel is made possible because asian brands have a lot of freedom with sun filter formlations (not possible in the US because of FDA regulations). Anyway, it turns out that cosrx took the time to have this specific sunscreen fda approved, which is why the list of ingredients resembles that of US sunscreens a whole lot. I only realized this after trying it on for the first time because, contrary to the other reviews, it is very greasy and heavy. Now, my definition of greasy and heavy is based on the time it takes to absorb into the skin, and how it feels after. It will take a good minute to fully blend this into the skin and you'll definitely feel it on your skin for a good hour after application. It WILL feel like a sunscreen. It reminded me a lot of la roche posay and banana boat sunscreens (yes I consider those heavy and greasy). To be completely fair though, I am a little spoiled by asian sunscreens, so, if youre used to how US sunscreens feel, you'll be fine with this. In summary, don't buy this sunscreen if you're looking for a typical lightweight asian sunscreen.

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2024

title: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2024
content:
I really wanted to like this sunscreen. It was very well reviewed no matter where I looked. It is supposed to be good for sensitive skin. It is supposed to give a "glow."

It seemed to function as a sunscreen so that's why it got 3 stars.

I took 2 stars away because this lotion goes on thick and geasy. It doesn't really get any less greasy as it sits on the skin. It feels like my skin is covered with a heavy grease all day.

It says it supposed to make your skin "glow." It sort of does if you think "glow" is supposed to be incredibly shiny. I wasn't impressed with how it made my skin look.

I suppose this would be good if you have skin as dry as the Sahara. If you don't, it will sit on your skin, feel heavy, feel greasy, and feel like it has sealed all your pores.

I am so disappointed. I wanted to like it.

title: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2024
content: I'm typically opposed to sunscreen because of the stinging of eyes, smell, and white cast. I'm from Hawai'i so the smell of sunscreen typically reminds me of tourists, but this sunscreen is not only reef friendly but smells pleasant, almost like the smell of Bio Oil. It also has absolutely no white cast, NONE. I was in so much shock, it's better than La Roche or Cerave. I'm an olive colored, mixed Blasian woman and the minute it hits your skin it just melts. For some it may seem like it's greasy, but it's perfect for me, it gives that Korean glass skin look. There is also no piling, I noticed with Cerave sometimes it would pile or leave white clumps on the edge of my face, this does not. I also do not experience any eye burning, which is nice. The only reason you would experience this is if you applied it directly over your eye lids or near your eyes which they advise not to do. My only complaint is that it is not water proof so if you plan on utilizing this during excessive sweating or any type of "wet" activities lol do not expect this to do it's job. That is also stated in the product description.

title: COSRX Vitamin E Vitalizing Face Sunscreen SPF 50, 1.69 fl oz, SPF Moisturizer, Lightweight under Makeup, Travel Essentials, Summer Essentials, Korean Skin Care, Korean Sunscreen for Face
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2024
content:
I have been wearing Sheiseido's zinc-based face spf for years. It's long-lasting and very reliable (I swear it's why my skin looks pretty good at age 40) but its very matte, and leaves a white cast. I switched to this stuff for the fall/ winter but today I went out biking with it on, no sun hat, and I'm not sure it protects as well as the Sheiseido stuff does. It's also a little greasy. THAT being said, applying makeup over it is MUCH easier. It's pretty hard to get an even application over the Sheiseido stuff.

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2024
content: I love this serum. It’s not too strong when I put it on. I have tried other vitamin C serums that really stung. That is not the case with this one. It’s very easy on the face and I don’t feel like I’m gonna get a rash or anything from it. I definitely feel that it’s making a difference with my fine lines. It also absorbs very well, so it’s not sticky and it dries pretty quickly.

title: COSRX Pure Vitamin C 23% Serum with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid, Brightening & Hydrating Facial Serum for Fine Lines, Uneven Skin Tone & Dull Skin, 0.7oz/20g, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2024
content: Probably one of the best Vitamin C serum out there. Sure, there's a strong smell but it goes away after a few minutes. I've read one review where it supposedly made someone sick and that's just not scientifically possible. Unlike other VC serums I've used, this one seems to lock in moisture. While it does have a slightly oily texture to it, it's nothing to worry about especially if you apply (which you should) moisturizer after. It definitely leaves a nice glow and it's part of my morning routine prior to apply moisturizer and SPF.

title: COSRX Pure Vitamin C 23% Serum with Vitamin E & Hyaluronic Acid, Brightening & Hydrating Facial Serum for Fine Lines, Uneven Skin Tone & Dull Skin, 0.7oz/20g, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2024
content: After showering on a Friday evening, I applied the serum to my face. The smell was absolutely disgusting, but I was prepared for that having read the reviews. I had no negative skin reactions. A couple of hours later I started to get a headache. I took some ibuprofen, put the heating pad on my head, and went to sleep. I woke up at 3am with a terrible headache and I felt nauseous. I want to note that I get frequent migraines and that this was not a migraine headache. It was a painful tightness all around the top of my head. Also, I realized that the heat from the heating pad was reactivating the smell of the serum on my face, which was really gross. When I finally tried to get up and move around at 7am it was awful. I felt like I had the stomach flu. Sweating, shaking, nauseous. And then I threw up. I really did think I was sick and didn’t even consider the serum until a few hours later. I talked to my sister and mentioned my thoughts about the serum. She suggested that I take a long hot shower to try and get it all off of me and to change my bedding. So I did, and by the end of Saturday I was feeling not 100% but so much better. I haven’t seen any other reviews that mention this type of reaction. I tried googling it too and found nothing, so obviously this could be some kind of weird coincidence that I got sick for a short time while trying to use this product. Either way, I’m too scared to try it again. The smell alone might make me sick anyway. Good luck!

title: COSRX 15% Niacinamide Face Serum, 0.67 fl oz, Pore Minimizer Serum for Face, Even Skin Tone, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2024
content: I buy this product between Ulta and Amazon. My most recent purchase from Amazon I was very surprised to find the product tampered with or I received a bad batch. The consistency was like water and literally rolled off my skin. I have used this product for a long time, and know it’s suppose to have a thicker viscosity and it absorbs almost instantly into the skin. I knew immediately something was wrong when the droplet immediately ran down my skin. I am not sure who is at fault here- cosrx for a possible defective batch or someone in the fulfillment center is tampering with cosrx products. I even double checked whether the product came from a third party or cosrx- supposedly it came directly from the company. I’m not too happy because I have no clue what I just placed on my skin- could have been toilet water for all I know. Gross. Please, for anyone new to using this product- squeeze one droplet and if it rolls off your skin like water it’s tampered or defective- Do not use!

title: COSRX 15% Niacinamide Face Serum, 0.67 fl oz, Pore Minimizer Serum for Face, Even Skin Tone, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2024
content:
Play Video
This product itself is fine, but it didn't even last 30 days I purchased this during black Friday recieved on the 23rd of Nov. Now it is Dec. 18th, and this bottle is completely empty. I used 2-3 drops a every evening and maybe also 2-3 drop 3-4 mornings a week. Honestly it's insane that this didn't even last a month for a product with a $25 price tag. I would rate these ingredients a step above a drug store brand, yet far more pricey. Which makes the misleading packaging a huge disappointment to say the least.

I would be happy with a 5-10% niacinamide serum with more quantity in the bottle, since the research on the use of niacinamide is based on a 5% concentration. This feels like a major money grab in my opinion. Want my money back. Will not be purchasing again. Will go with mad hippie or good molecules instead because they offer quality and fair quantity for the price

title: COSRX 15% Niacinamide Face Serum, 0.67 fl oz, Pore Minimizer Serum for Face, Even Skin Tone, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2024
content:
I’ve been using the COSRX Niacinamide 15% Serum and have noticed a significant improvement in my skin. It is definitely what I would consider one of my holy grail products for skincare and anti aging. My complexion looks brighter and more even, which is exactly what I was hoping for. The serum feels lightweight and absorbs quickly, making it easy to incorporate into my routine.

The only slight downside I’ve experienced is a bit of peeling if I use it daily, but it’s not painful or overly noticeable. My skin is pretty sensitive, so this might just be my personal reaction. Those with less sensitive skin may not have this issue at all. Overall, I think it’s an excellent serum, especially if you’re looking for a brighter, more even complexion.

You may not have heard of this condition, buts it’s when your oil glands secrete too much and you develop bumps on your face. It’s not pretty and there are few remedies.
I’ve have them burned off my face (ouch) , had chemicals applied and had them abraded. I’ve done the retinol routine, too. This is the formulation that seems to reduce the bumps and prevent new ones.
Best I’ve found so far with dealing with the bumps.

title: COSRX 15% Niacinamide Face Serum, 0.67 fl oz, Pore Minimizer Serum for Face, Even Skin Tone, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2025
content:
1. Months of Dedication, No Results
After diligently using this product for several months as directed, including following up with moisturizer and consistent sun protection, I can confidently say it failed to deliver on its promises.

2. Overhyped and Overrated
COSRX as a brand has been hyped up, but this serum proved to be a massive disappointment. The fleeting sense of anti-aging benefits was barely noticeable, and certainly not worth the investment.

3. A Waste of Money and Time
Considering the price and the time spent waiting for results that never came, I regret purchasing this serum. The cost is unjustified, and the “benefits” are nonexistent.

4. Better Alternatives Exist
I would highly recommend exploring products from Beauty of Joseon instead. Their formulations offer far better results without the frustration or wasted effort.

5. Final Verdict
Never again will I buy into the COSRX hype. This serum was a letdown in every sense—save your money and try a brand that actually delivers.

Would not repurchase or recommend.

title: COSRX Pure Sodium Hyaluronic Acid 3% Serum, Hydration & Moisture Boosting Facial Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles, Plump & Repair Dry Skin, 0.67fl.oz/20ml, No Artificial Fragrance, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX Pure Sodium Hyaluronic Acid 3% Serum, Hydration & Moisture Boosting Facial Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles, Plump & Repair Dry Skin, 0.67fl.oz/20ml, No Artificial Fragrance, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2024
content:
I have used hyaluronic acid daily for several years. I top it off in the morning with a light moisturizer followed by sunblock. This review is based on that usage.

The pros:
- I have no pilling with this product. I have used The Ordinary hyaluronic acid and found that it causes pretty distressing levels of pilling. See above, I layer my products. Alone, other products may not pill. If you layer, this is a good option.
- No odor. I have purchased other products from other brands that have a pleasant odor. I like that this brand is unscented, but as we all know, being unscented and having no odor are two different things. Gasoline doesn't have fragrance added, but it's stinky. This product has no odor, either when applying or when dry.
- Effective. I haven't taken photos to know how effective this is day to day. I always use it, my face is getting older (it is what it is) and I think I'm holding up pretty well. I will say, if I don't put it on right after my morning shower, I feel the difference. I feel dryer, and my skin is less "springy".
- Pretty container. This might not be a pro to someone else, but if you have a little display for your lotions and potions, this looks nice on display.

Cons:
- It is costlier than other brands, but not prohibitively.
- The container is a weird shape. It's also black. It is not possible to know how much you have left, and it's hard to get the last drop.

Overall, I have bought this a few times and will be buying it again.

title: COSRX Pure Sodium Hyaluronic Acid 3% Serum, Hydration & Moisture Boosting Facial Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles, Plump & Repair Dry Skin, 0.67fl.oz/20ml, No Artificial Fragrance, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024
content:
First you must know this isn't a full ounce but .67 ounces - they could do better with making sure that is front and center so customers know the amount. I am a little disappointed in COSRX for not being completely transparent about that. I really had to search to find the amount. I adore COXRX skincare as my skin absolutely loves it, but this is where they drop the ball. That out of the way ---

The serum is beautiful. It's medium thick clear. Glides on my skin so smoothly. Very hydrating. I pair this with the COSRX snail mucin - it took me a long time to order snail mucin as it is a little gross and I make sure to avoid my lips (ew), but the two together calm down my rosacea redness--I have Type 1, which is redness and flushing - stinging if my barrier is compromised.

This has Sodium Hyaluronate, which is the better hyaluronate as far as it has a smaller 'molecule size' so it can penetrate better--at least this is what I understand.

The fourth ingredient is glycerin, which is very hydrating, and adds a lot to the formulation.

I put this on damp skin, and whether I use the snail mucin first, second, or not at all, after applying on damp skin I dampen a makeup sponge or use damp fingers to pat and press more moisture into my skin. I let that 'sink in' for a while - 3-5 minutes or sometimes longer before going on with my skincare.

Sometimes my cheeks will be red and this along with the mucin will immediately calm it down - well, immediately as in about 30 seconds or so after applying. Even the act of applying skincare can make my cheeks turn red.

I love that COSRX is not expensive at all - even at less than an ounce, it's still a bargain. This along with Beauty of Joseon are my two favorite K-Beauty brands and I don't use much of anything else anymore.

title: COSRX Pure Sodium Hyaluronic Acid 3% Serum, Hydration & Moisture Boosting Facial Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles, Plump & Repair Dry Skin, 0.67fl.oz/20ml, No Artificial Fragrance, Korean Skin Care

content: He estado usando el suero de ácido hialurónico puro de COSRX durante unas semanas y debo decir que estoy impresionada. Su textura ligera se absorbe rápidamente en mi piel, dejándola suave y tersa al instante. Lo que más me gusta es su capacidad para hidratar profundamente sin dejar sensación grasosa. Después de usarlo regularmente, he notado una mejora significativa en la hidratación y luminosidad de mi piel. Además, su fórmula suave y sin fragancia es perfecta para mi piel sensible. En resumen, este suero se ha convertido en un imprescindible en mi rutina de cuidado de la piel, y lo recomendaría a cualquiera que busque una hidratación profunda y duradera

title: COSRX Pure Sodium Hyaluronic Acid 3% Serum, Hydration & Moisture Boosting Facial Serum for Fine Lines & Wrinkles, Plump & Repair Dry Skin, 0.67fl.oz/20ml, No Artificial Fragrance, Korean Skin Care

content: Great Hyaluronic serum, but it’s just too small. I ran out faster than anything else I have purchased. I’m an Esthetician of 20 years and product obsessed. I have tried everything from very expensive products to drugstore. I got rid of all my Peter Thomas Roth and Dr Dennis and other products. I’m now strictly using all Cosrx products. Why? Because in all my years of skincare obsession, THIS brand is the only one I have had noticed results in less than two weeks.

title: COSRX Retinol 0.5 Oil, Anti-aging Serum with 0.5% Retinoid Treatment for Face, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, & Signs of Aging, Gentle Skincare for Day & Night, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
content:
Unfortunately, the COSRX Retinol Oil didn’t work for me, which is such a disappointment because I’m usually a big fan of COSRX products. I absolutely love their Snail series—it works wonders for my skin—so I was hopeful that this product would be just as good.

However, after using the Retinol Oil, my skin started acting up. I experienced irritation and breakouts, so I had to stop using it entirely. I understand that retinol can be tricky for sensitive skin, but even after trying to introduce it gradually, it just didn’t agree with me.

It’s a bummer because I wanted this to be a staple in my routine, but it ended up being a miss. That said, COSRX still has some amazing products that I’ll continue using, just not this one. If you have very sensitive skin, you might want to patch test thoroughly before committing to it.

date: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2024
content: I have tried so many retinol products (as well as other anti-aging and skin smoothing products) and this is the best overall. I have age 50+ mature, dry, sensitive skin. A lot of retinol products end up burning my eyes or flaking my skin, they have a weird texture, smell bad, or just don’t work. This is like liquid gold. It’s in oil form. I put it on about an hour before I go to bed so it has a chance to absorb. I eliminated all other serums at night. Now I just use this after I cleanse my face. It’s all I need. My sagging chin has lifted and my skin is much more even and smooth. I didn’t have a lot of wrinkles for my age, but it’s smoothed the crow’s feet around my eyes. I’m on my 3rd bottle. I saw a difference after only about a few weeks. It’s amazing stuff!

content: I love COSRX products except this one. Found out it contains a hazardous chemical called BHT. BHT is an endocrine disruptor affecting the thyroid and sex hormones. Also has reported toxicity for the liver, kidneys and lungs. Very toxic to marine life.

title: COSRX Retinol 0.5 Oil, Anti-aging Serum with 0.5% Retinoid Treatment for Face, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, & Signs of Aging, Gentle Skincare for Day & Night, Not Tested on Animals, Korean Skincare
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2025
content: I love this retinol serum however be aware it's concentration is higher than others so a little goes a long way. I never had any skin irritation or any issues when applying it in my regular skincare routine. However it's advised not to use retinol every day or when scrubbing your face. It's very lightweight and your skin is able to absorb it nicely so it won't leave your face oily. I noticed that if you don't keep it in the fridge that the color of the serum may change to a darker color due to oxidation so best to keep it in a regular fridge.

content: I’ve always struggled with large pores and now that I’m getting older, I’ve noticed they’ve gotten much worse. I Googled what would help shrink them and found Retinol does the job. And it does! Both of the pictures are in the sun but I couldn’t quite duplicate the exact same sun exposure/ pose but both are of my right cheek. The picture with my earring is after and the picture that is brighter is before. It’s not a huge difference but I’ve only used it twice (along with my other skincare) and can see a difference not only in pictures but in person. Also, the instructions say to use it only a few days a week as it may cause irritation and I did do a day break in between the two uses and did not experience any irritation at all. If I remember, I’ll update this with a photo in a month or two! 10/10 would recommend!

title: COSRX Retinol 0.1% Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2024
content:
I really like this product since tretenoin was too harsh for my skin. I only use as needed probably less than once a week. but i especially like to use it when i notice my skin becoming congested/break out starting and during the winter since we’re not in the sun as often so it’s safer. Literally by the next morning, it seems to stop breakout in its tracks. I see some reviews had some bad eye reactions and I just want to say be careful with using retinol in the under eye area. You “can” but you probably want to avoid it, the under eye skin area is very delicate and much thinner than the rest of our face. In fact you will find most retinol products telling you to avoid the eye area on the package…unless it’s sold as an eye cream. Just a tip!
And if you’re peeling a lot from this, you’re probably using it too often and or not moisturizing enough. Like I said I only use this once every other week, which is to avoid irritation/peeling. Also, I noticed the info says you can use this in the day with spf, which is surprising because dermatologists would tell you to only use retinol before bed at night. This is because it is both safer (retinol makes your skin sensitive to uv rays) and just convenient (your skin “heals” overnight, working alongside the retinol). Also, not to invalidate some of the ladies who shared their photos of their reactions but if you have very smooth skin, hardly visible pores with no signs whatsoever of aging and you’re not prone to breakouts, you really don’t need to use retinol and probably shouldn’t because it can damage the skin barrier with long term use or if you don’t moisturize enough, so ladies who CAN benefit from retinol are using it because the reward of that is greater than the risk of the skin barrier issue…no offense but I do think people should read about these “heavier” chemical skincare treatments before just buying… But luckily this product is a much gentler version of prescribed retinol. I really love this product in moderation. Just one use at night and the next morning I definitely notice a difference! Thanks for reading :)

title: COSRX Retinol 0.1% Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care

content:
I’m writing this review because I’m tired of brands not listing all product ingredients on Amazon, especially something like Glycolic acid. This is especially important for people with sensitive skin. I use different products and it’s important to know all ingredients so I can make sure I’m not mixing things I shouldn’t be. I already use an aha like Glycolic acid in my toner so don’t need any extra.

I immediately noticed something was off by the smell. Doesn’t smell bad but had a little kick. I guess I’m becoming a pro at face creams because I immediately noticed something was up lol. I used it for about two weeks without any issues but I don’t need an exfoliate in my face cream.

Otherwise, the product seems to do what it claims but wish brands would include a full list of ingredients, especially the strong and important ones.

Its not that i don't like this cream. I actually really liked it. The texture is nice, light but hydrating. It is good quality & didn't leave a sticky residue. It seemed to hydrate my dry skin pretty well. CosRX is a great brand & i use other products of theirs. I only got to use this 3 times though, bc apparently I am allergic to snail mucin! After the 3rd day I started getting hives. I had to discontinue use and ended up giving it to my mom, who didn't have a reaction and loves it. I got it on sale for 8$ so it wasn't like i was out a bunch of money. Btw the bottle is HUGE. Itll last a while.
Apparently, a lot of people are allergic to snail mucin, so always do a patch test before putting it on your face (as with any product)!! I give it 4 stars bc it is a good product, but beware of the allergy potential. I know it says to patch test first, and it's my fault for not doing that, but i wish they would tell people about the potential and frequency of snail mucin allergies. Yes, I have Google, so again more my fault than theirs, but i just want companies to be more transparent.

content:
I don’t usually write reviews but this one needed it. Honestly I was expecting a small package since it’s a Korean product (thy can be too small for the price asked). So I ordered two during the Black Friday sale. I was so shocked at the size of the product that now I’m wondering what should I do with the second one (hahaha).

Anyways starting the product is sticky and it feels like I’m dabbing a huge sticky blob on my face. But it gets immediately absorbed and my face feels moisturised. As I have a combination skin (dry in winter and oily in summer) I feel this is a good product. I use the cream before sleeping and when I wake up, I check to see if any stains are there on my silk pillowcase (None thank god) and when I wash my face, it washes off well. This means that the product was absorbed well and it adds a nice moisture layer that is required.

I still have to try it in summer but when it’s oily skin season but for now it’s a great product for all those people who cannot decide which product is good for them or who have multiple seasonal creams.

content: Yet another TT overhyped product. It's a rather snotty/mucus consistency in jar but absorbs without a trace. Now I have fairly low maintenance skin. I get by with Cetaphil products and an occasional heavier cream moisturizer in the colder months. I don't regret buying the products, they're so mild and have causes Zero issues, but I can't justify repurchase because there's no obvious result.

date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024
content: It's difficult for me to open the box yet worth the fight. I love the sound upon opening. The suction says it's well packaged. It's a fantastic product. I noticed while starting on the second bottle an improvement in my skins appearance. I had have discoloration but my skin is much more even toned now. This is a pleasant surprise. No C serum improved my skin. I use vitamin C serum because you're "supposed" to. This one works. This product even teaches users how to apply and massage the serum in. I'll continue to buy the COSRX serum because it works. It lasts about a month using once daily. For the price that's good enough considering less effective vitamin C serums show no improvement at all. I love that users are taught to refrigerate this C Serum. That means top notch quality! The last picture is the difference the loss of potency when the product is not refrigerated . The final picture is the serum when it's fresh and refrigerated. The serum is lighter in color when it's kept cold and fresh

content:
I bought it on sale on Amazon, tossed the packaging, and placed the bottle on my counter to use after I finished my Fleur&Bee Vitamin C. Went to open the CosRx bottle today and THERE WAS NOTHING THERE. No evidence of a leak or anything. Did the product just evaporate over time because that would mean the packaging is faulty.

I rushed to Ulta to see if I can get another bottle pronto and there was brown residue on all of the outer boxes…which suggested to me that there’s a leak somewhere. I shook the boxes that were in stock and it sounds and feels like each had varying volumes.

Faulty packaging, couldn’t use, won’t risk buying it again. It’s too bad because I really love CosRX products.

title: COSRX Morning Skincare Routine- Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser + Low pH Good Night Soft Peeling Gel, Cleanse and Exfoliate Sensitive Skin, PHA, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
content:
The AM wash is great. It smells like teatree oil i do not know if thats in it but thats the closest description of the smell I am familiar with.
It leaves my skin soft and not tight feeling. I use it every night and every other morning.. although it does irritate my skin if I use it twice EVERYDAY so I alternate my morning face wash with a different mild cleanser.
The pm peel does work. People say it pills in your hand and yes it can. My facial girl told me dab it on your face then rub. I was skeptical at first that the product was what was pilling so I used it, washed it off, and used it again and it didn't pill the second time immediately after washing it off so contrary to other reviews it is not just the product pilling. I use it 3 days a week and have noticed my face looks less congested and cleaner.
I did have to stop using my curology prescription though because it was burning if used together so be mindful what other products you are using.
I do recommend this as it has helped me alot however it probably isn't the BEST for sensitive skin.

content: I saw so many great reviews for this product line, so seeing all the deals I decided to give it a try. I tried the snail face wash, serum, face cream and eye cream. Only made it one day and I had to stop. None of these products actually moisturized my skin, but dried it out instantly. I kept reapplying the lotions to see if it would help (winter in Wisconsin and all, ok maybe I needed a little more to get going). Wrong! By the end of the first day, my PD was flaring up, when it had been dormant for a bit. I was getting the red, burning dry spots to either side of my mouth and a red patch under my left eye. I stopped after a day and went back to coconut oil and olive oil. My skin is recovering, but sadly I am still searching for the right product for me. 0/10 stars, absolutely would not recommend!

title: COSRX Glass Skin Starter Set, Amazon Exclusive, Advanced Snail 96% Mucin Power Essence & Retinol 0.1% Cream Mini Sample, Daily Hydrating & Firming Korean Skin Care Kit, Gift Set
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
content:
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I’ll admit, I was skeptical about putting snail slime on my face. But after just one use, I’m ready to personally thank every snail involved in this masterpiece. My skin is so smooth and reflective that I’m basically a walking highlighter now—no makeup required.

When they said “glass skin,” I thought, “Okay, marketing hype.” NOPE. After one application, my pores disappeared like they had a scheduled PTO. I can practically see my future in my reflection, and spoiler alert: it’s hydrated and radiant.

The texture? A little slimy (obviously), but who cares when the results are this good? My skin feels bouncier than a brand-new mattress, and the glow? Oh, honey, the glow is so real that a stranger asked me if I drink 12 glasses of water a day. I told them, “Nope, just snail magic!”

If you’re on the fence, jump off, run to this product, and prepare for your face to look like it was kissed by angels (and snails). Five stars? More like infinity stars. Highly recommend!

title: COSRX Glass Skin Starter Set, Amazon Exclusive, Advanced Snail 96% Mucin Power Essence & Retinol 0.1% Cream Mini Sample, Daily Hydrating & Firming Korean Skin Care Kit, Gift Set
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2024
content: I've been dealing with sensitive skin and skin problems for many years and so e things kind of work and some literally burned my skin or made my skin worse. I'm 36 and a few years back found out I have not only sensitive skin but also Seborrheic Dermititis on my scalp and face. I've been trying to find something that won't dry out my skin and something that won't be so oily my face freaks out. I know some k-beauty and K-beauty makeups I've tried are very good and don't freak out my skin so I thought you know what let's try this! I use a biore sensitive face cleanser and a toner afterwards and let my face calm down for a minute or two. Then I dampen my face a little with water and use one pump of the snail extract on my face and neck, I rub abd tap it in until I cant feel it. At night I do the same but every other night I use a little of the retinol cream on the middle of my face and where I have blackheads, wrinkles and pimples rub it in and then apply the snail extract. This stuff works and I've had bumpy, scaly, huge pores most of my life and it will take some time and even ny friends at work are noticing my face isnt as red and scaly and I have less dry skin in 4 weeks. So keep going and keep using this!! Only thing I have a complaint about is I wish the retinol cream came in a bigger bottle or maybe it does!!

title: COSRX Glass Skin Starter Set, Amazon Exclusive, Advanced Snail 96% Mucin Power Essence & Retinol 0.1% Cream Mini Sample, Daily Hydrating & Firming Korean Skin Care Kit, Gift Set

title: COSRX Glass Skin Starter Set, Amazon Exclusive, Advanced Snail 96% Mucin Power Essence & Retinol 0.1% Cream Mini Sample, Daily Hydrating & Firming Korean Skin Care Kit, Gift Set
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2024
content: tried this brand on a whim, trying to find clean, cheap, k-beauty facial products and this was the winner. after using the peptide booster and essence for about 3-4 weeks now day and night i am completely sold. I have acne prone and combination skin, oily t-zone, drier on the cheek area, and sensitive around the nose, these products have not made me break out at all and ive even noticed significantly less breakouts. my red marks seem to be slowly fading too...i now use their other products as well and get a nice "glass skin" effect after using. My favorite part ,though, is the poor shrinkage this stuff is capable of! my only slightly downside of this, is that, in my opinion this stuff can be slightly drying, but as long as you pair it with a nice moisturizer your in the clear....also just a heads up snail mucin has a slightly thick slimy texture, but please dont let that deter you, give it a try!!

title: COSRX Low pH Niacinamide Micellar Cleansing Water Daily Mild Facial Cleansing Wash for Sensitive Skin, Sebum control, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2024
content:
this micellar water on a baby wash cloth is my saving grace after a long tiring day. sometimes I struggle to do my skincare routine when I'm exhausted, but not washing my face doesn't help me in any capacity. Well, here comes COSRX to save the day once again.

I squirt a healthy portion of this onto a soft microfiber cloth and wipe my face down, and I can double duty and do it while I'm doing my 60 second mouthwash. It's a lovely one-step cleanse and tone for those days you can't be bothered. Slap on some moisturizer after and I'm ready for bed in about 5 minutes flat including brushing teeth.

I love THIS micellar water over others because of the Niacinamide and the beautiful viscosity of the water. It really has a great amount of surface tension that puts it ahead of the game as far as micellar waters go. It's worth it. Get it. You won't regret.

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2024
content:
This serum is a must-have addition to any skincare routine, especially if you're aiming for improved hydration, plumping, and texture. I have normal-combination skin, and I've been working on improving my skin's moisture barrier as well as the overall effectiveness of other products I use. It comes in a clear bottle with a pump that dispenses just the right amount to cover the entire face. I typically use 1-2 pumps as the first step after cleansing. Its water-like texture absorbs instantly, prepping my skin for products like snail essence, serums, and moisturizers. The lightweight, non-sticky formula boosts overall skin health, addressing pores, firmness, fine lines, and more.

I'm particularly impressed with how this serum improves absorption and creates a smooth, soft complexion. COSRX consistently delivers high-quality, effective products at affordable prices, and this serum is no exception. K-beauty has earned its stellar reputation for a reason! I pretty much plan to keep this product in my daily routine forever. For anyone looking to enhance their skin condition, this serum is legit!

content: I have extremely oily skin and all the products I have used in the past that were meant to control oil have not worked for me. What I love about this serum is that the texture is very light, almost like water, but when I apply it, my skin feels plump and moisturized. I only need a small amount and can wear it under makeup. Other serums feel heavy and sticky on my face, which makes me oilier and usually causes breakouts. I've only been using COSRX for a couple months, but it seems like it's repairing my skin barrier and helping my face look less dull.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2024
content:
This is my 4th COSRX product. I’ve been pretty happy with them all! I started with the essence serum. LOVE IT! Get it and use it twice a day. Then I ordered the .01 retinol. Together, fantastic! Your skin may get dry and start to peel slightly after some use. I just lay off the retinol when that happens. I ended up ordering the retinol serum next to up the retinol. You have to keep it in the fridge. I don’t know if I’ve noticed that much change with that one but something must be happening because my sister in law complimented my skin. So I ordered the overnight rice mask. I like that one. I love how my skin feels in the morning! I don’t wash my face with soap in the morning, I just rinse with water then use the essence before I put my moisturizer and makeup on. I saw this peel because I feel like I needed a boost. Light tingles, nothing bad. Rinsed off with water after 10 min. Omg LOVE the feeling of my skin after!
Last night I used it for the second time. I left mine on a little longer than 10 minutes ( I’ve been doing peels a long time) and it felt great! No irritation or burning at all. You know your skin so listen to your skin. If you can’t do the full 10 minutes then take it off. You can always build up to it. Skincare is definitely not a one size fits all. So don’t try to be a champ. Do what you can and listen to your skin!

I will also state after I started using the essence and seeing results I ended up ordering the 7 light therapy hand held device. That completely took my skincare to the next level! I have seen a huge difference in the texture, hyperpigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles. I usually use the light with my essence serum just fyi. I’m going to try the eye gel next I think.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
content:
I have very dry and sensitive skin and I have always been scared to use AHAs and BHAs since there's very strict routine that you have to follow. However, I have found their instructions on the box to be very straightforward and easy to follow. The most important thing to remember is to put on sunscreen during the day after you use this product.

This is a very strong product! Immediately after my first time using this, my skin felt SOOO much softer! I am impressed by how smooth my skin was and to my surprise, my skin wasn't irritated from it. When I first put on the product, my skin does sting quite a bit but the stinging does end up going away after a minute or two. If the stinging does not go away for you, it could mean that you might be allergic to the product.

You do have to work quite fast when you are applying the product as it dries pretty fast. I would recommend working on one area of your face at a time. When it dries, it becomes a bit sticky and if you touch your face with sticky dried product on your finger, it removes some of the product from your face. The only way to try to apply an even application after it has dried is to add more product to your fingers to smear onto your face. The product itself does not have a pleasant smell. It smells very acidic and reminds me of vinegar. While the name of the product does have the word "peel" in it, I was under the impression that this would be a peel off mask. However, turns out it's an chemical exfoliant so what it means by peel is that it peels away at dead skin cells.

Given it's a chemical exfoliant, I do err on the side of caution and wash off the product at the 8 minute mark despite the box suggesting 10 minutes. I figured that it takes me 1-2 minutes applying the product to my face so some parts of my face might've gotten longer exposure to the product. When I do wash it off, I make sure to wash it off thoroughly and wipe down with a toner to make sure all of the residual acid has been washed off of my face.

Another tip is that if you have tattooed or micro-bladed eyebrows, I would recommend that you try to keep this product away from your eyebrows as it could speed up the fading of the tattoo as it's exfoliating the top layer of your skin.

Overall, this is a nice product that helps me achieve very glowy and smooth skin. Although the box warns against using on sensitive skin, my experience was fine and it didn't dry out or irritate my skin. Make sure you follow the instructions to a T and not use this product more than once a week AND make sure to put on sunscreen in the daytime. Through using this product for a couple of weeks, I have noticed my overall skin condition has improved as I have less clogged pores and less acne now. Excited to continue using this product!

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
content:
I haven't used a peel like this before but have heard good things about COSRX products and wanted to give it a try. I've used it twice now, spaced a week apart, on clean dry skin as per instructions.

The red color makes it easy to apply thoroughly, and to ensure you've completely rinsed it off afterwards. The first time I only left it on for 5 minutes as I wanted to make sure it didn't cause a reaction. I did feel some tingles at first, but it subsided before I had even finished applying the mask. The second time I left the mask on for closer to 9 minutes. Same thing, a little tingling at first but it quickly subsided. I used a good moisturizer after rinsing off and haven't had any issues with peeling or dryness/flakiness.

It takes some time to see products work on your skin like this. I do feel after 2 uses that the pores on my nose, my biggest problem spot, show some *very* slight improvement. Between that and the lack of irritation, and this little tube looking like it's gonna last a lot longer than I'd initially thought, I'm going to give 5 stars.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
content: Almost a dupe, maybe a good option for those with sensitive skin.. This peel is more gentle than the famous red peel, I did feel it working but it didn’t make my skin itch or tingle the way the other one does. My skin felt really smooth after using it, I wasn’t red or irritated at all.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
content:
So I’ve never tried any skincare product like this before, but have tried a few CosRX skincare products which I LOVE! So was eager to try out this COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel!

I have fairly sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions. I have only been using on my cheeks, as that’s where I have enlarged pores. They recommend leaving on no longer than 10 minutes, I have only kept it on for 4-5 minutes and my skin has done well with that timeframe!

I’m shocked at this stuff! When I say NOTHING helps my pores, I mean NOTHING helps my pores! But THIS helps shrink my pores!!! I mean, I can still see them, but there is definitely a noticeable difference with just using a few times! So I know with continued use, I will see even a bigger improvement!

There are some great ingredients in this such as AHA BHA PHA LHA + Vitamin Trio + Hyaluronic Acid.

There are a few things to be careful of while using this. They suggest you avoid using with Vitamin C, Retinol, or Niacinamide-based products. ALSO, make sure to wear an SPF!! They also say to limit use to ONCE a week!

I love this stuff!! Another winner from COSRX! Definitely recommend and definitely will be ordering again!

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
content: Sometimes my face looks dry and flaky in spots even after moisturizing but I used this peel once each weekend for one month and my nose and dry patches near my chin and mouth feel smoother. My moisturizer goes on better and lasts longer without my face getting flaky. The peel did not leave me red or tingly, but I only applied to my nose, chin, forehead, and lower cheeks. I still have most of my blackheads but I did start with a lot. Seems to be worthwhile for me.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
content:
I was apprehensive about this but I decided to just go for it. I don’t have very sensitive skin, but it is sensitive.

I love that this is colored, because it helps me see where I’ve missed, which thankfully hasn’t been much as I’m not doing my full face.

I decided to target treat areas, and did my nose, cheeks and chin. These are my worst areas, and the ones I know will benefit the most. After two weeks (2 applications) I have noticeable improvement I am happy to report. I may try to use this every 5 days, but I’m undecided on that. I’ll stick with once a week for now and see how results come.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
content:
I have a very rough forehead. I don't know if it is because I am a face sweater or what, but I have to be very aggressive to exfoliate my forehead. I can not believe how soft my forehead was just from one five minute use of this peel.
I have never used anything like this before and was a little nervous with all the warnings. I did feel a bit of strong tingles for the first minute, but that went away completely pretty quickly. I only left it on for five minutes the first time and for most of my face that was more than enough.
The second time I used it I kept it on for four minutes before rinsing it off of everywhere but my forehead which I left it on for an additional four minutes. For me that seems like the perfect times.
I am glad to no longer need to scrub my forehead.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care

content: It’s a gel consistency and it’s easy to apply. However, be sure to read the ingredients as they are strong and shouldn’t be used with other skin care. I applied it to my nose and cheeks & it did leave the pore looking smaller and my skin looking brighter.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
content:
I am a huge fan of K-Beauty and I also love many other COSRX products so was eager to try this. It works exactly as expected. I don't have sensitive skin but with any new exfoliating products I ease into them to see how my skin will tolerate them. I had no issues when following the directions and left it on only for a few minutes. My skin felt great afterwards and it seemed to make a noticeable difference with no irritation.

Overall, very impressed with this product and will continue to use occasionally in my exfoliation rotation.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
content:
I have extremely sensitive skin but have used another COSRX product without any reaction so I decided to try this peel. This listing page says it is safe on sensitive skin, but the verbiage on back of the product specifically recommends that only people who are experienced in acid exfoliation and without sensitive skin use it. Which is it?

Listing page:
"Can this be used on sensitive skin? Based on a clinical test on 20-60 men and women between 20-60 years old, the AHA BHA PHA LHA 35 Peeling Gel is safe to use on sensitive skin."

Back of product:
"We recommend use only if you are an experienced user of acid exfoliation and your skin is not sensitive."

This contradictory information made me very hesitant to try the product. I ended up doing two patch tests on the inside of my elbow and on my wrist. I did not have any reaction so decided to try on my face. I used it for only five minutes and got visibly red on my forehead and cheeks and experienced a burning sensation. After washing off with warm water, I used LaMer Moisturizing Gel Cream which is soothing and good for burned skin.

The following day I did have light peeling on my forehead. While it is recommended to use once a week, I will use it bi-weekly in hopes of minimizing any visible peeling.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
content:
I'm very happy with this! It didn't burn or irritate my skin in the slightest, which was a pleasant surprise given my sensitive skin. I definitely recommend doing a patch test first for safety. Although my skin's appearance hasn't changed (yet!) it feels much softer.
Despite the small size of the tube it comes in, I anticipate it lasting quite a while since you should only use it once a week.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
content:
I was apprehensive about using this but I have heard amazing things about this brand. I decided to give it a go after washing my face with my usual cleanser and making sure it was dry, I applied it evenly around my face and neck. This is a jelly like consistency almost, and a bright pink color. It didn’t give me any issues while using it nor did it cause any issues immediately after using it.
I felt no negative reaction so I feel like it isn’t too harsh. Now, that being said, I’ve just used it once and I made sure to apply a generous amount of serum and moisturizer to my face after using this.
I can’t wait to see what results I get from using this. I’ll be back to update but for now it gets a positive review just for the ease of use and lack of negative reactions.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
content: This is a quick mask that you put on dry, clean skin and wait a few minutes, no more than ten, and then wash off with lukewarm water. I kept this on my skin for around seven minutes. At first there was a little bit of tingling, like a strange feeling but it went away. I washed it off with warm water and there was no residual weird feeling or sensitivity in my skin at all. I have sensitive skin, so I was worried it would leave my skin red or irritated and it didn’t at all. If I use a chemical exfoliant I typically use one I leave on for the whole night so this was different for me. I’m not sure if I noticed a difference right after using it but when I woke up the night after using it my skin looked more even and smoother. I like that this is something super lax in terms of skincare as you only have to use it once a week and it’s super easy to do.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content: This skin peel is really nice. It has a red/pink color and a gooey kind of consistency. The box says to apply a thin layer to your face, leave it on for up to 10 minutes, and then rinse off with warm water. It didn’t irritate my skin at all. I feel like I did notice my pores looked much better after using this for a couple of days. It is a really nice product.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content:
I was a bit nervous to use this peel because I was just starting to recover from some sort of unexplained sensitive burning skin. My skin felt rough in certain areas and a bit flakey. The description said it was fine on sensitive skin so I decided to give it a try.
I am happy to report that this didn’t burn or irritate my skin in the slightest. I think I felt comfortable taking the risk because it’s from such a reputable brand, but maybe the safer advice I’d offer others is to do a patch test first. As far as the rough patches, they’re gone! I still felt a little roughness (though significantly reduced) the same evening I used this, but it was gone by the next morning! My skin doesn’t look any different but it sure feels smoother. The tube it comes in is pretty small though. The instructions say to use a generous amount. Not sure how many applications I’d get out of this if using a generous amount. Maybe 8-10?

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content:
This is very easy to use as you just apply the gel which is a bit sticky on your skin and then within 10-15 minutes, you can start to peel it off. It peeled off very easily and then I washed my face. It does have some chemicals but it also does exfoliate the skin well and removes most of the dead skin on my face. It did leave the skin clear and soft as well. It unclogs the pores and evens out the skin and really softens the skin after use.
If you have a lot of blackheads this will help a lot.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
content:
From the first few uses, I found this peel to be good for exfoliation, leaving the skin smooth. It's a powerful treatment that targets overall texture and appearance of the skin, making it suitable for those dealing with stubborn skin issues.

However, it's essential to be cautious with chemical exfoliants, as they can be potent and potentially irritating for some skin types. Using it as directed and performing a patch test is recommended. Also, it may not be suitable for those with very sensitive skin.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2024
content: Is say my skin s pretty sensitive. Didn't leave on for the full 10min. but still left my skin shiny and smooth without peeling. Had a beautiful radiance and definitely smoothed out my fine lines. For me it worked better than the ordinary one! Will be buying again.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
content: Exp is almost 2 years in the future. Has packaging box and bottle - no seals. Made a funny noise when firat attempting to squeeze out product. The gel is very red. The product is easy to spread. I did not notice any peeling so I do not know why it is called a peal. Did feel a tingle after about 7 minutes. Easy to rinse off. No strong smell.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
content:
I have fair, usually pretty sensitive skin.
I used this as per the directions, on a dry cleansed face.
I decided to leave it on for only a couple minutes, as the box says not to keep it on for longer than 10mins.

It's viscous/thick transparent red gel and I had to use more than I thought I would to cover my face in a thin layer.
It started to itch/pinprick a bit, mostly on my cheeks but it didn't last long.

Like I said I only left it on for 2 or 3 minutes and then thoroughly washed it off with water.
My pores were significantly smaller and my skin just looked clean and matte finally! I am sooooo impressed with how my skin turned out.
There has been no peeling or redness or anything as of the next day either, however I did follow up with a hydrating hyaluronic acid serum after this, so I would suggest moisturizing with a non pore clogging Moisturizer.

Very very pleased with this!
I wish there was more in the tube. I will likely leave it on for a minute or two longer next time to see how my skin responds.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
content:
Overall happy with how this worked! I had high expectations since I've used this brand's other products before and loved them.

I normally have oily skin and sensitive skin. Sometimes my skin gets a little dry since I use differin (retinoid). We just turned the heat on recently and didn't start using our humidifiers yet - so this week my skin was a little dryer than usual. Because my skin was dryer I stopped using differin two days before using this and three days after.

I normally wash my face with a gentle cleanser twice a day and use differn at night. I only use a moisturizer if my skin is dry to begin with. So the only part of my "beauty routine" that I changed was stopping the differin.

This felt nice going on and a few days later my skin feels a little on the dry side/tight but looks better and feels smoother! There was no strong smell. Hoping after using for a few weeks I have more noticeably cleared pores (peels speed up the skin turn over rate but it's still going to take a few weeks to see full results realistically). I'm just happy that my face didn't peel off or feel like it was on fire like other peels I've tried.

Only complaint is the small tube size.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
content: ALWAYS a great brand I love trying. This is no exception. Works great, and feels great on the skin. Works well to exfoliate and clean. I trust this brand, and always have high expectations, but it always seems to come through for me. No strong smells, feels good, and works to leave your skin feeling clean, but not tight or dry.

title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care

content: I use this once a week for 10 mins and my skin looks fabulous. Make sure you take Vaseline around the mouth, nose and eyes because this is strong. title: COSRX AHA BHA PHA LHA 35% Peel 1.01 fl. oz / 30 ml, Chemical Exfoliating Peeling Gel for Dull, Rough, Oily Skin with Clogged Pored & Dead Skin Cells, Highly Concentrated, Korean Skin Care
