date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
content: Cosrx is definitely one of my favorite Korean skincare brands on the market! I love the size of this product! It's huge and has a pump for easy dispensing. A little bit of this cleanser goes a long ways! It starts as a clear gel - similar to the consistency of shampoo but thinner - and as you add a bit of water and mix it together it foams up wonderfully. I love how smooth and fresh my face feels after using this product. I would say it protects my skin like a charm and is extremely effective at removing makeup and dirt. I've been using it for a few weeks now and I still have a ton of product left! I have a feeling this product will last a long time! I will admit that if you're sensitive to scents, this product may not appeal to you. It has a distinctive tea tree oil smell, it doesn't bother me personally but if you do not enjoy this scent than this product may not be for you. Other than that, I highly recommend this product!!!!

No particular fragrance. I usually just buy drugstore cleansers (it’s just cleansing so I don’t buy expensive brand name) but this and the Biossance squalene cleanser are actually worth the money

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2024
content:
I am so in love with this product. It makes me want to wash my face more often (washing my face used to feel like a chore). I use it mostly in the shower, leave it on for a couple of minutes. I lather it on first, then wash it off after shampooing etc.. somehow, magically, it melts on the face, gets rid of the top layer? aftermath is a squeaky clean face but not dried out. Byebye pores. I can't explain it but everything from no scent, to how gentle yet effective it is, works for me.
I don't think I'll try other face cleansers for a while. this one is a keeper.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2024
content: I’ve been using this cleanser for several years and my only complaint had been about the cap —it held water and grew mildew, also made it hard to use just a little product. The new larger pump bottle is perfect. It’s a great value for a high quality cleanser. My skin is normal to dry.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024
content: This cleanser, made in Korea, comes packaged in a 13.52 ounce bottle with a pump dispenser. The clear gel is low pH, unscented and made from purifying botanical ingredients especially for sensitive skin, so anyone should be able to use it. As directed, before using it, I splashed my face and neck with warm water and then applied the cleaner into the palm of my hand and onto my wet skin. I let it sit on my skin for a minute or two while I massaged the gel gently all around my face and neck area before rinsing it off with warm water. It did an excellent job cleaning my dry, sensitive skin and left it feeling clean, smooth, calm, and refreshed. I did not have any adverse reactions to this product.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2024
content: It's a daily mild face cleanser that's perfect for sensitive skin like mine, and it's formulated with BHA and tea tree oil to help balance pH levels and keep your skin clear and healthy. I love how gentle it is—it doesn't strip my skin or leave it feeling tight and dry like some cleansers do. Plus, it's free of parabens and sulfates, which is always a plus in my book. The 13.52 fl.oz (400ml) bottle is also a great value—it lasts forever! If you're looking for a gentle and effective cleanser that won't irritate your skin, I definitely recommend giving this one a try.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2024
content: it’s very gentle on my face. I do have oily and dry skin and uneven texture, and it helps with that.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2024
content: The scent is tea tree-- be aware. The soap lathers well and makes me feel clean without overly stripping or agitating my skin. If you have sensitive shin, red skin, or acne prone skin, I suggest this product. Give it time to work its magic and make sure to use it day and night. It is gentle and does not leave any scent or residue on my skin.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
content:
What don’t I like about this product — I can’t think of anything!
Seriously, everything is to like; it has a clear thick texture with a very settle nature like and tea tree smell. When I first started this process I was definitely determined to stay consistent with a SCR (skin care routine). This among other from CORX has COMPLETELY CHANGED my appearance in tone and blemishes. I struggle since I’ve grown younger 🙃 to stay consistent with regimens. I have combination skin in my T zone area. During my cycle transition I tend to break out. And I can really think of a time during puberty when I had clear skin for more than a three week span. I usually break out on my forehead and chin now my cheeks break tend to break out because of hand resting. This product I waited to review because I needed to see a change before I could review. I love this product and now subscribed for future delivery’s. 10 out of 10!!

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
content: This arrives in an unsealed box and the product itself is not sealed either. It's got an expiration date about 2 years out printed on both the box and the bottom of the bottle. It smells a little bit like tea tree oil, which makes sense because that's one of the ingredients. This does a good job cleaning my face and doesn't irritate my skin.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
content:
The bottle is pretty big for a cleanser so it should last you quite a long time since you'd be using this once a day. The gel is exactly like a gel. Its clear as water and thick like toothpaste kind of. But it quickly waters down in water. Its definitely not the kind of cleanser I would remove makeup in since its not the most cleaning feeling cleanser I've used.

This cleanser is super gentle. Sometimes when I use it I don't feel much of a difference to my skin. Its not stripping and doesn't leave my face feeling dry afterwards. Definitely is good for those with sensitive skin!

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
content:
Ordered for my wife and here is what she said about it.
"I was so happy when my husband surprised me with this cleanser. I have sensitive skin and I always struggle to find a gentle but effective product. This cleanser is amazing! It has a low pH that matches my skin's natural acidity, so it doesn't strip or irritate it. It also has tea tree oil and other botanical ingredients that soothe and hydrate my skin. It lathers well and leaves my face feeling fresh and clean, without any tightness or dryness. I love the subtle citrus scent too. It's like a spa in a bottle. I highly recommend this cleanser to anyone who wants a gentle and refreshing way to start their day."

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

content: Our Teen daughter has been complaining about dry skin and rashes lately on her face, and she wanted to try a Korean brand (COSRX). We found this on Amazon with good reviews. $30 for 13.5 floz bottle. Its been two weeks since using the cleanser, and she is so happy with it. No more dry skin and rash. I think I will borrow it sometimes to try it on myself.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
content:
The COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser is a clear gel with a light tea tree scent.
The gel transitioned to a light soft lather with little foam after massaging with water.
Feels gentle and soothing on the skin. Cleanses and rinses well.
Skin feels soft and clean but not dry, ready for the next skincare items.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

content: Smells like old lady eventhough it's unscented

I have always had good results with Korean beauty products and this one is no exception. It is a very gentle, lightly foaming gel. Nice big pump bottle.

I think the tea oil would make this especially effective for teen skin because of the antiseptic properties. I'll admit it isn't one of my favorite scents. Not over-powering nut a sensitive nose will be aware of it.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)

content: a bit expensive but is a large bottle so it should last a long time. does strip my skin of oils mildly. not an everyday use item because i feel it is a bit to harsh for that but every other day or when my skin gets to oily. a single pump in enough to wash my face even if it doesnt seem like it at first as it does lather up a bit when applying.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
content:
I really like this COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser. It lathers well and leaves my skin feeling really clean. I also like that it doesn’t seem to strip all the oils out of my skin. Seems to take off regular mascara very well.

The scent is hard to pin down. It’s kind of astringent - not something I can put a name to. It might bother you but I don’t mind it.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
content: Just started using it and I already know I like it.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content: This is a very mild and gentle cleanser that leaves my sensitive skin feeling clean and soft without over-stripping. It lathers nicely and doesn't really have a smell. I love using this in the morning and in the evening. My skin hasn't become irritated or broken out while using this.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content:
I'm very happy with this facial cleanser, it's been so good for my dry and sensitive skin.
I only need a very small amount of the gel each time because it foams up a lot with water.
It takes a little longer to rinse off than other cleansers, but afterward my face feels wonderful.
It leaves my skin hydrated, balanced and feeling healthy.
I don't get the over-tight, dried out feeling that other cleansers give me.
After a week of use, I've noticed the small bumps on my forehead and jawline (from my skin being too dry) have gone away almost entirely.
The cleanser has no added fragrance, but it does have a moderate chemical odor from its ingredients.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
content:
Big bottle will last at least 4-6 months since I won’t be able to use every single day since is a little too strong and strips my skin compared to other Korean cleansers.
I prefer to use this gel on the days my skin is more oily than normal.
Overall good cleanser but be careful if you have a sensitive dry skin.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
content:
You receive a nice big 13.52 fluid ounce bottle of facial cleanser here. Plenty to last you for a good, long time. Even for frequent face washers. It seems to be fairly clean and gentle enough on the skin. Cleans well and will help remove excess sebum without causing the skin to clog up.

It does leave my mature combination skin a tad bit dry feeling, but that's easily rectifiable with the addition of my regular skincare regimen. I do like this when I'm feeling extra oily, especially after a spell of using too many heavily rich emollient ladened skincare products. Most likely though, I will give this to a teenaged family member so they can be assured they are cleaning with a good facial cleanser for their skin type. This feels like something that would be especially good for those with oily and problematic skin. Fine also for those with normal skin, though I would highly suggest to follow up with a suitable serum and moisturizer. Good for both men and women alike, and especially good for teenagers.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
content: This comes in a huge pump bottle that will last forever. This cleans my face well and doesn't leave my face dry. My only issue with this is I hate the smell. Others have said there is no smell, but mine smells awful, almost reminiscent of gasoline. I only deducted one star because it does clean well and I don't feel like the scent lingers on my skin.

title: COSRX Low pH Good Morning Gel Cleanser, Amazon Exclusive, Daily Mild Face Cleanser for Sensitive Skin with BHA & Tea Tree Oil, PH Balancing, Korean Skin Care (13.52fl.oz/400ml)
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
content:
I prefer gel and oil cleansers and this one is good for the days I workout and am super sweaty. It cleans off the sweat and dust that accumulate on my face while cycling. After using this product, my skin feels stripped of natural oils so I now follow it with an oil cleanser. My skin type is dry & sensitive so too much stripping of natural oil increases sensitivity to the point of anything I apply on my face will sting. For this reason, I only use it on days when my face is very dirty.

This would probably be a good cleanser for skin types other than sensitive.

title: COSRX Retinol Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care (Retinol 0.3% Cream)

title: COSRX Retinol Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care (Retinol 0.3% Cream)

content: I have gotten this once and it came with dents and the first time I tried it, the product came out of like 3-4 little holes on the sides. It isn’t strong enough or it’s too hard to use without this happening!! I returned mine and got a new one which is the one in the picture that is all tiny and folded up because you basically have to figure out how to get it out the right way while also catching and trying to make use of all the holes and leaks and cracks that form that let the product out as if there is 5 openings to get what you can from!! I never even meant to get it ever again bc of it but I wasn’t paying attention and it came from subscribe and save automatics. Honestly, I’d just get a product of retinol in a different way and/or from a different brand etc. I’ve never had issues with COS RX but they designed the worst possible tube!!! title: COSRX Retinol Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care (Retinol 0.3% Cream)
date: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2024
content:
I'm no stranger to retinol; in fact, we're old friends, and sometimes, arch nemeses. It's not that I don't love the final results (clear skin without acne, reduction in wrinkles, etc); it's getting to the end of those initial side effects that give us a rollercoaster of a relationship. If I haven't used any in a while, my skin will be oozing oil so badly that ExxonMobil will be knocking at my door. 😆

I've been using retinol for a long time on most of my face; I even double up in troubled acne breakout areas and use retinol AND adapalene, but I've been terrified of using any retinoids in my under eye areas and on my neck, because I've tried many before, and they irritated the heck out of my neck and dried out my under eye areas.

Retinoids can be drying and can burn in these sensitive areas. On me, it tends to happen in a matter of hours. But this one didn't! It is silky, unlike the adapalene gel I use, and seemed to absorb right in - unlike ANY of the retinol and tretinoin formulations I've tried. I am kind of astonished that other companies, knowing what the purge can do, haven't made their retinol products this way, because this is the *chef's kiss* PERFECT texture. I took a chance using theirs in particular because I love all of this company's other products that I've tried (their 6 peptide booster, moisturizer, and peptide under eye serum). They are ALL so silky and luxurious. You would think you were using luxury brands, except you can still afford to pay bills! lol

I also love how they were thoughtful enough to put a warning on the tube in case someone squeezed it too hard before puncturing the top (you know what I mean: when you open a metal tube and the product comes flying out, and you can't get the cap back on fast enough). That in itself is reason to appreciate this company, because they DON'T want you to waste your money.

I don't know how this product will work long term, but I'm definitely going to find out! I'll be back to edit if there are any issues, but between the low cost, effectiveness of the ingredients, and the fact that I LOVE their other products, I am hopeful and I'm glad I took a chance on it!

title: COSRX Retinol Cream, 0.67 Oz, Anti-aging Eye & Neck Cream with Retinoid Treatment to Firm Skin, Reduce Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Signs of Aging, Gentle Daily Korean Skin Care (Retinol 0.3% Cream)

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2024
content: I was looking for a new skincare regime, something more affordable with good results. I had come across multiple reviews for this line and after reading up on the different products, I decided to give this one a try. I used it for about two weeks and started to notice changes in my skin. I have combo skin with an oily T zone but after using this my skin started drying out tremendously and I noticed small red bumps but nothing too alarming. I also ordered the moisturizer with this set and loved how it would go on but after an hour my skin would feel dry, tight and uncomfortable. I did a Google search trying to find out if other people were developing similar symptoms and much to my surprise found that the dryness I was experiencing was more than the product not working. IT WAS AN ALLERGIC REACTION. The search also revealed that people who have dust mite allergies, me, shuld not use this product. It would have been nice if there was mention of this beforehand and definitely something the company should disclose. Unfortunately for me the return period has closed but as soon as I stopped using it my skin returned to normal which I'm grateful for.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2024
content:
This COS RX Niacinamide 15% Peptide Booster Set contains 2 more fantastic products by the Korean brand Cos Rx! If you haven't tried their products, you should. My skin seems to like their products and, despite having sensitive skin, they haven't caused me any irritation.

I followed the seller's suggestion to use the toner directly after cleansing and applied a few pumps of the peptide toner to my face using my fingers. I let that soak in for a minute and then applied a few drops of the niacinamide serum, again using my fingers to pat it into my skin. I followed up with my normal moisturizer. I prefer to do this routine in the evening, so that I can let my skin have time to absorb everything without worrying about my makeup getting icky.

The peptide toner has a lot of great ingredients that can help reduce redness (which is a big issue that I have), give skin a more plump look and help make your skin look more nourished. After using this set for 2 weeks, my skin looks less irritated and feels softer. This would also make a great gift set for anyone wanting to try the Cos Rx brand.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024
content:
This COSRX Niacinamide and Peptide Booster Set is the perfect example of why Korean beauty is so popular; you can get quality products and ingredients at an affordable price.

The peptide toner/serum is meant to be used after cleansing, and it can be used as one layer or even applied again for multiple layers. The peptides in this are listed high enough in the ingredient list that there is likely enough to genuinely improve skin, although note that improvement takes consistent usage over tiime. This has the famous Botox-in-the-bottle peptide, and while that name is aspirational, over time, it is thought to seriously improve hydration which in turn improves the appearance of wrinkles. The other various peptides have anti-oxidant properties, soothe inflammation, improve skin texture and strength, brighten skin, and reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Dipeptide diaminobutyroyl benzylamide diacetate probably has the least research backing it (it's all funded by the manufacturer), but overall, this is a great combo of peptides. This also has additional hydrating ingredients that help the skin barrier. Yuka 86/100 = excellent.

The niacinamide serum is also great for skin. Niacinamide brightens skin, improves collagen production, and improves the skin barrier. It's also helpful for some inflammatory conditions. Yuka 100/100 = excellent.

This serum has more niacinamide than many products, and while the vast majority of people will tolerate this concentration used as directed, anecdotally, some experience redness. Some temporary redness is not a problem (think of the niacin flush), but if the redness lingers or develops over time, you might want to use less, perhaps one drop mixed with a pump of the toner so you can spread it evenly. Usually, other ingredients are actually the problems for sustained redness, but anecdotally, some are more sensitive to niacinamide than others.

I have fairly reactive skin, and both of these products work great for me. They absorb quickly and neither causes any reaction. They are a great addition to my routine since I use a strong retinoid and need to protect my skin barrier, but these ingredients should help just about every skin type. While some might be skeptical of skincare products improving skin, even my kid has noticed how great my skin looks since I started getting more serious about it 6-12 months ago.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2024
content:
I am a fan of the Korean skin care products. They contain some of the most beneficial ingredients to keep my skin soft and smooth. This product is packed with Niacinamide which is all the rage in skin care products.

I always start out with a clean face. Most toners are applied with cotton balls but this toner is patted on and some what layered in the application process, that is why you merely pat it into your face and let it dry well. Then you apply the serum which is a very lightweight serum that easily penetrates the skin and starts boosting the healing of my skin. The bottle of toner is larger as it takes about 3 pumps to adequately cover the face and remember to layer the applications. The serum is so lightweight and easily smooths to cover the entire prepped facial area with 2-3 drops.

After the serum is completely absorbed, add a moisturizer and proceed with applying makeup. The healthy glow and softness of my skin has sold me completely on this product and I highly recommend the purchase as the price is really decent for this product.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum

If you don’t know K Beauty yet, COSRX is where you should start! I absolutely love Korean Beauty products, and I actually started inadvertently with COS Rx products!

Cosmetics Rx? Not sure if that’s what it stands for, but it should!

I absolutely ripped this high-end seeming package of 2 full-size products and had slathered them on my face within minutes.

The booster toner is honestly serum-level thickness to my hands/face. I thought it was going to be a spray more liquidy-thickness but it’s just a pump like any normal serum.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2024
content:
I used this for a few days now, and I have nothing but good things to say about the COSRX peptide booster set. The peptide booster toner is the first step after washing my face, and I felt like it was very gentle, moisturizing, and calming for my skin. It comes as a pump which is interesting for a toner. The consistency is very low in viscosity.

The serum is incredible. It stung a little bit for a few seconds on my initial application. It was not drying. My skin felt so smooth after using it. I noticed the difference the most after 2-3 days. I am very impressed with this new line, and plan to continue using this as an addition to my skincare routine.

Edit: after using for almost two weeks, my skin has never been smoother and acne free.

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum

I already use the COSRX Niacinamide 15 every day but I had not tried the Peptide Booster – they are a great together. I have combination skin & this serum works great to help prevent breakouts & keep my skin smooth & firm.

Made in Korea

title: COSRX Snail Mucin 96% Peptide Booster Set - Amazon Exclusive - Korean Skin Care, Gift Sets, Skin Care Sets for Women, Advanced Snail Mucin Serum, Face Serum
date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2024
content:
The COSRX Niacinamide 15% Peptide Booster Set, Niacinamide Serum & 6 Peptide Booster Toner, Daily Skincare Duo - It's just as advertised.

What I love about Cosrx having tried their products previously is they have high quality ingredients without breaking the bank. Copper Peptide and Niacinamide are two of the top ingredients for skin care. I have attached a copy of the ingredients for both products so you can decide for yourself. For the ingredients listed what there is the most of is first and what's they're the least of is last. This is important buying any skin care product. Fo example, if the product says it has an Niacinamide you want to see it towards the top and not at the bottom of 30 ingredients.

This is not an instant product it takes at least a couple weeks to notice a difference and maybe sooner if you use it day and night.

The serum itself is a half an ounce and the toner is about 5 oz. The serum a little bit goes a long way and you do want to use it sparingly. The combination of both products left my skin feeling very soft and moisturized.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2024
content:
I love this brand and was excited about this product because of the reputation and reviews. I have very sensitive skin and am extremely selective of what products I use because of that.

First, these don’t even stay in place at all. I even laid down and they just fell to the side instead of down when I was briefly standing for a moment.

Even the momentary opportunity this had to get on other places of my skin irritated it tremendously and burned so bad. While the skin around my eyes is okay, the cheek area just below my eyes began to burn and turned red. I wiped it off and cleaned it up but it still burned horribly.

Very disappointed and returning the product immediately.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2024
content:
These undereye patches are a nice addition to any skincare routine, especially if you deal with puffiness or dark circles. They’re infused with peptides, collagen, and caffeine, which are known for helping to depuff and brighten the delicate under-eye area. You can use them in the morning before applying makeup or even as part of your nighttime routine for a little extra hydration.

To use, place the patches under your eyes and leave them on for about 10-15 minutes. They’re great for prepping your skin before makeup, as they help smooth out the area and make concealer apply more evenly. They come in a convenient jar with 60 patches, so you get plenty of uses out of them.

If you’re looking for a way to give your under-eyes a refreshed and hydrated appearance, these patches are a fantastic option, especially for those days when your eyes need a little extra TLC!

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2024
content:
I’ve been a huge fan of CosRX for a couple years now and always love trying their new products out, so was excited to try out these COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patches.

I have fairly sensitive skin and have had no adverse reactions.

The first time using them, I truthfully couldn’t get them to stay in place. They slid a lot. I decided to throw them in the fridge and then try again. BEST decision ever!! Not only do they feel AMAZING out of the fridge, they actually stay on and don’t slide off at all!! So I know I’m getting the full benefits of these patches!

I’ve been sick the past few weeks and these have been the only thing to really help rid the dark circles and bags under my eyes to make me look “half decent” haha! They have 4 Petides, Collagen AND Caffeine in them!

I’m in love - but needed some trial and error before I fell in love. Just make sure to PUT THEM IN THE FRIDGE!!

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2024
content: These are so cool to the touch initially and that helps with puffiness. Not to mention it really wakes me up. I have very dry undereyes so these are a great addition to my skin routine! There’s a good amount in the jar and I’ll be able to use these for a long time.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2025
content: These come in a pretty pink and has a spoon that has a bit of a profile which makes it easier to pickup (so many other jars of eye masks give you a flat spoon or tweezers that are hard to grab at times). I was really impressed with these patches. They did not slide down! All this time, ALL of the eye patches I've used (and it has been many) would slide down my face! I can be sitting at a desk, working and they STAY PUT! WHAT! Who knew such a feat of science was possible. I can leave them on for about an hour and they still seem to be moist. After I take them off, my eye bag area feels plump and soft. It may not long term change things up, but the cooling feel alone seems to make my eye area feel and look less puffy. Very happy and impressed with these COSRx patches. I'm a custy for life.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024
content:
Like a lot of skincare shoppers, I've used COSRX products and see them all over. A lot of people recommend their products due to their nice formulation. I've tried the snail mucin essence and cream. I've also given the cleanser and a sunscreen a try. I've liked all of those so I had high hopes.

I was very happy to find these worked well too. I like putting these are before bed or in the early morning before presentations. These help give less racoon-y and more alert eyes that are particular helpful for all-nighters I pulled due to certain projects. The patches have a slight cold touch which could just be due to the cold weather. They stay on well and help the eye area. I see temporary benefits but feel confident in their potential based on my first few tests.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024
content: I love CosRX, and this Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch is a welcome addition to my beauty cabinet. The masks come in a shallow tub with a itty bitty spoon to help scoop up each mask, and minimize contamination. These are some slippery, little guys but going on, they will stay put and are super cooling and soothing as soon as they hit the undereye area. With Niacinamide, caffeine, adenosine, B12 and all kinds of other skin loving ingredients, they work as described in depuffing under-eye bags, preventing fine lines and reducing dark circles. The serum has no scent, my skin isn't irritated, and my undereyes thank you!

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
content:
These are the first eye gels that I have tried from any brand that actually do feel like they wake my eyes up. They are very cooling, even if kept at room temperature (I sometimes put mine in the fridge for extra effect), and the patches stick relatively well. I have only used them 3 times so far, so I can't really speak to the collagen or anti-aging effects yet, but I do plan to continue to use these regularly, so if I notice anything I will update my review.

This is just a small gripe, but one thing I noticed is that the serum doesn't play too well with my undereye concealer. Even after massaging the extra serum in and giving it a few minutes to absorb, my concealer seems to go on patchy over top of it. I could always switch to nighttime use, but the inclusion of caffeine and the de-puffing effect really makes these better for the morning. I will keep playing around with them, and worst comes to worst I will just use them on no-makeup days. Otherwise I have been really enjoying and would recommend these eye patches.

My rating scale:
1 star: Horrible product. If I had paid for this, I would be upset.
2 stars: Pretty bad but not quite horrible. I would not reorder.
3 stars: Just ok. It could have been better, but it also could have been worse.
4 stars: Good! A solid product that met my expectations.
*****5 stars: Very good and/or a great value! I would definitely reorder.*****

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care

content: These eye patches are not too thick or thin, and they fit around the eye area well (I haven't tried other areas but they should work for elsewhere!) They have a decent amount of serum, stay put well enough, and are very hydrating and soothing.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
content:
This eye mask patch container has 60 patches for 30 uses (if you use 2 each time). It contains good ingredients including niacinamide, adenosine, caffeine, and Vit B12 to target puffiness and undereye hydration.

Directions include to apply the eye patch for 10 minutes or longer. I let them sit on my skin for 15 minutes and had no negative reactions, only positive. My eyes did feel less puffy and felt more relaxed. Definitely will continue to use dialy.

Received 12/5/2024, expires 9/2026.

The container is sealed prior to opening. Made in Korea from a very well trusted and known brand.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
content: I think this is a nice big jar and I was impressed to read and see on the product page that you can use these on your cheeks and other parts of your face than just the under-eye area. The jar and packaging are quality and mostly written in both Korean and English. I found the masks to be non-irritating and beautifully fragrance free. They are a pretty pink color but very slimy and slippery. I found that the eye masks slid down repeatedly and I had to reposition them for almost 10 minutes. The recommended mask time is 10-30 minutes and by the time I took them off at 30 minutes, most of the serum had become more matte and slightly dry. I found my skin was nice and happy and as such this was generally a pleasant mask experience other than repositioning the masks for a few minutes.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2024
content:
I have used skin care products from Cosrx before and loved them, so I could not wait to get my hands on The Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch from them. Under-eye patches are a way of life for me, I use them every morning first thing to de-puff my eyes.

These patches include a little tool to help separate them out of the jar they come in. All I really need in an eye patch is caffeine and peptides, but these patches go much further than that. They also contain collagen, niacinamide, betaine, panthenol, hyaluronic acid and sodium hyaluronate. So not only are they going to de-puff, they will also hydrate/moisturize/soothe the area, while also diminishing fine lines, and fading dark circles.

I've only used them a few times now, but I'm already loving them. The directions say that they can be used for 10 - 30 minutes, but I have not kept them on that long. They only need 10 minutes for de-puffing and any time after that I'm sure is beneficial for hydrating and working on wrinkles. The most I have kept them on for has been 20 minutes, and I have noticed that after doing that my under eye area looks a bit smoother.

I am super pleased with these patches and will be repurchasing them when I run out.

Highly recommended
Made in Korea

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care

date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
content:
These are properly infused with plenty of serum and can be used all over the face. I tested them under my eyes, on my laugh lines and in between my eyebrows. The fine lines under/on the side of my eye appeared diminished and supple.

My laugh lines were softer and almost gone. These were not irritating and my skin felt refreshed. I am happy with the formula and will continue using them in my routine. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

title: COSRX Peptide Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch, 60 Patches, Under Eye Patches for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles with Caffeine, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2024
content:
I ordered these under eye patches to help with eye pouches which I seem to have nearly every morning (although by the end of the day they're usually gone). So my eyes need a little extra help in the morning. These Korean made patches DO contain the #1 most important ingredient to address this issue: caffeine. I love caffeine because it really does work for pouches and it goes to work quickly. You don't have to "try it out for two weeks", nope - it starts working right away to provide temporary relief from this often recurring and common complaint.

These eye patches are absolutely sopping with product. They give you a little spatula thingie to extract a couple from the jar. You need that really because the patches are really slippery and hard to handle. But I'll say once you put them on they do seem to hold in place pretty well. I can feel an active ingredient, probably the caffeine, working in these. And they do work based on my test, for eye pouches. They probably won't do much for under eye circles, as that's more of a genetic issue but for pouches they do make a difference.

This is a typically high quality Korean made product of the best ingredients. Recommended.

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Glass Glow Hydrogel Face Masks Skincare 3 EA, Collagen Face Mask, Travel Essentials, Overnight Face Mask, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2024
content:
One of the things I liked most about this mask was how well it adhered to my face. With most gel masks, I usually struggle with them slowly slipping down my face and they usually need a little time (probably to dry out a bit) before they'll really stick. This one stayed put almost immediately. And the only issue I had with the fit was the nose area, which was cut too wide for me so the sides stuck out. This is a common issue I have with gel masks though, and I simply fix it by cutting out the nose section and applying it separately.

Unfortunately, I didn’t experience the brand’s claim of "glowing glass skin after just 1 use." The glow I got was more muted - the natural oils in my T-zone gave me more of a glow. What I did experience was some improvement in hydration, a reduction in redness and irritation, and slight lifting. But the skin firming effect seemed more like the result of the gel mask being physically pressed against my skin, rather than any specific ingredient or formulation. In fact, I could get the same result with a hydrocolloid bandage, which contains no active ingredients at all.

Overall, this was a better-than-average gel mask, thanks to its great, almost instant adhesion and the pretty good results it delivered. However, it doesn't quite live up to all the claims made by the brand.

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Glass Glow Hydrogel Face Masks Skincare 3 EA, Collagen Face Mask, Travel Essentials, Overnight Face Mask, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2024
content:
These are so good. I got them for stocking stuffers but I think I'm going to have to keep these for myself. I've used a few of these type of collagen masks and this is definitely in my top 2. I appreciate that the instructions say to wear for 2-3 hours because most say 3-4 or overnight, which is so unnecessary.
These leave me feeling as hydrated and as supple as ever. They give you that great glass skin glow. I find glow generally lasts for a day or so but the hydration is noticeable for a few days beyond that.
They are very soothing to any irritation and redness. I wish they were a hair cheaper, but I know these are kind of a new product category, so that will take a while.

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Glass Glow Hydrogel Face Masks Skincare 3 EA, Collagen Face Mask, Travel Essentials, Overnight Face Mask, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2024
content:
I've used plenty of COSRX products before, and they've all be very good. This one also does not disappoint whatsoever. This is best used when you're going to bed. Yes, it can be a little impractical. Yes, you may find half of the mask torn and by your bedside when you wake up the next day. But it is still worth it to keep this sucker on your face for as long as possible. They work really well and you wake up with clean, awesome looking skin.

The only downside for me was the price. This used to be a good and affordable brand. Now that they've hit it big and have some loyal customers, they've upped their price on their products. Not unexpected, but still disappointing. Charging 15 bucks for 3 masks is way too much IMO. But, you can likely use this as a special treat for yourself or as a nice gift for someone who is into skincare.

The quality of the masks is good and if you've the $ to spend, or if this goes on sale etc. no hesitation in recommending it!

title: COSRX Advanced Snail Mucin Glass Glow Hydrogel Face Masks Skincare 3 EA, Collagen Face Mask, Travel Essentials, Overnight Face Mask, Korean Skin Care
date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2025
content:
Don’t mind my silly picture. There’s absolutely no flattering way to take a pic in this mask! I just received my masks today. 3 in a pack. I currently have one on and so does my daughter. No burn at all like some masks. The mask feels cooling on my face. It’s slimy and a little sticky but in a good way because it holds up on your face great and doesn’t slide off. I did rip a little bit on the size from pulling it but that’s because I wasn’t gentle. As you can see in the picture I even took the mouth and eye piece & placed them in random spots that weren’t covered.

**Washed my face with the Cosrx face wash, used The Ordinary toner, applied Cosrx snail essence, then the mask. Which is what the directions said to do. I definitely have a glow & my face looks brighter. It is slightly sticky, but so is castor oil. I always wake up super soft after using castor oil so I’m sure it’ll be the same with this. I’m just hoping I don’t break out before a lunch this weekend. My black heads on my nose were non existent. While my mask was applied I could see it pulling my black heads. I had all these little black dots come to the surface. I was hoping when it came time to take the mask off that I would pull what it brought out. So I’ll have to see! I’ll keep updating.
